['', 'Deep understanding in one of the following domains: ad fraud detection, risk control, quality control, business integrity, and online advertising systems.', "TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.", 'TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process. If you need assistance or an accommodation, please reach out to us at USRC@tiktok.com.', 'Ability to think critically and to formulate solutions to problems in a clear and concise way.', 'Contribute to the success of a rapidly growing and evolving organization with speediness and quality.', 'BS degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or other relevant majors with 2+ year of work experience', 'Collaborate with strategy team, product managers, policy team and other key stakeholders to define products and drive initiatives from engineering viewpoint.', 'TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video and aims to inspire creativity and bring joy. Launched in over 150 markets and in 75 languages, TikTok has global offices including Mountain View, Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.', "Build highly scalable systems including ad fraud detection, risk control, ads integrity systems, to improve tiktok user's experiences with ads across the platform.Collaborate with strategy team, product managers, policy team and other key stakeholders to define products and drive initiatives from engineering viewpoint.Contribute to the success of a rapidly growing and evolving organization with speediness and quality.", "Build highly scalable systems including ad fraud detection, risk control, ads integrity systems, to improve tiktok user's experiences with ads across the platform.", 'BS degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or other relevant majors with 2+ year of work experienceExcellent programming, debugging, and optimization skills in general purpose programming languagesAbility to think critically and to formulate solutions to problems in a clear and concise way.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Experience with one or more general purpose programming languages including but not limited to: Go, C/C++, Python.', 'Given the fast growing of TikTok in the world, we are working on building next-generation ads integrity system for TikTok Ads. We are seeking Software Engineers in all levels which can help us to anticipate, predict potential threats, and build systems to protect against these treats. You will have a chance to work with a fully globalized team made up of great engineering talents in different countries, and work closely with cross-functional teams to build safe and trusted connections between users, businesses, and TikTok.', 'Preferred Requirements:', 'Minimum Requirements:', 'Deep knowledge in one of the following areas: machine learning/deep learning, large-scale systems, data, full-stack.', 'Excellent programming, debugging, and optimization skills in general purpose programming languages', 'Experience with one or more general purpose programming languages including but not limited to: Go, C/C++, Python.Deep understanding in one of the following domains: ad fraud detection, risk control, quality control, business integrity, and online advertising systems.Deep knowledge in one of the following areas: machine learning/deep learning, large-scale systems, data, full-stack.']

job_title: Global Safety Surveillance and Analysis Data Analyst
job_text: ['', 'we', 'Qualifications', 'Collaborating with multi-functional teams to develop innovative and effective approaches to address post-market safety issues.', 'BS or MS in Computer Science, Business Analytics, Statistics, Biostatistics, Math, or other quantitative discipline.', 'Whatweoffer:', 'Good organizational skills with strong attention to detail.', 'Requirements (skills / experiences) for the role:', 'Evaluating post-market safety data as well as other relevant data sets and proposing algorithmic solutions to extract business value: algorithms include but are not limited to natural language processing, structured and unstructured data (text) classification, and machine/deep learning.', ' Evaluating post-market safety data as well as other relevant data sets and proposing algorithmic solutions to extract business value: algorithms include but are not limited to natural language processing, structured and unstructured data (text) classification, and machine/deep learning. Developing tools with statistical and/or artificial intelligence models to automate established routine work processes or analyses. Continuously improving current data mining methodology, tools, and systems. Collaborating with multi-functional teams to develop innovative and effective approaches to address post-market safety issues. ', 'Proficient in R and at least one other data modelling/analysis language, such as Python -Ability to explore and manipulate structured and unstructured data at moderate/large scale.', 'BS or MS in Computer Science, Business Analytics, Statistics, Biostatistics, Math, or other quantitative discipline.Proficient in R and at least one other data modelling/analysis language, such as Python -Ability to explore and manipulate structured and unstructured data at moderate/large scale.Experience with analytical tools, including manipulation and visualization of data using reporting tools. Statistical analysis experience or clinically oriented informatics research is a plus but not required. Experience with Tableau, Microsoft BI tools, and/or Alteryx is a plus.Experience in data analytics: extracting/summarizing data and reporting results with strong understanding of data models, relationships and sound analytical principles.Strong written and verbal communication in English with ability to communicate technical topics to non-analyst colleagues. Experience communicating human health, safety, and clinical information is a plus.Ability to work in complex systems.Good collaboration skills, able to establish and maintain strong working relationships.Good organizational skills with strong attention to detail.', 'offer:', 'What', 'Continuously improving current data mining methodology, tools, and systems.', 'Experience with analytical tools, including manipulation and visualization of data using reporting tools. Statistical analysis experience or clinically oriented informatics research is a plus but not required. Experience with Tableau, Microsoft BI tools, and/or Alteryx is a plus.', 'Experience in data analytics: extracting/summarizing data and reporting results with strong understanding of data models, relationships and sound analytical principles.', 'Description', 'Ability to work in complex systems.', 'About Us', 'Developing tools with statistical and/or artificial intelligence models to automate established routine work processes or analyses.', 'Good collaboration skills, able to establish and maintain strong working relationships.', 'Strong written and verbal communication in English with ability to communicate technical topics to non-analyst colleagues. Experience communicating human health, safety, and clinical information is a plus.']

['', '5+ years of business experience leading analyses and initiatives with track record of business impact.', 'Manages analytics team(s) for one or more product areas.Applies experience from strategy consulting, analytics, and data engineering to successfully direct the development of statistical and mathematical analyses to support business decision making for one or more business functions. Seen as a thought leaderLeads development of solutions with moderate complexity and risk with business area implications. ['DAT Solutions offers competitive compensation and an excellent benefit package that includes medical, dental, and vision coverage, flexible savings accounts, 401K, Life and AD&D insurance, a comprehensive Paid Leave program, and a Tuition Reimbursement program.', 'DAT Solutions is a next-generation SaaS technology company that has been at the leading edge of innovation in trucking, freight, and transportation supply chain logistics for 42 years. ['', 'Experience working with large relational and non-relational databases', 'We are an award-winning enthusiastic team, passionate about innovative, data-driven approaches to bring the right therapeutics for the right patients, and ultimately save millions of lives.', 'Self-motivated, highly disciplined, and passionate about saving lives with every line of codePhD or MS degree in Computer Science or related fields; 2-5 years of work experience preferred, but we will consider strong candidates with less experienceProven programming skills: We use Python along with shell scripts, R, SQL, and other programming languages as needed.Experience building new solutions using Docker and the Kubernetes container orchestrationExtensive experiences with cloud computing platforms including AWS and GCPExperience working with large relational and non-relational databasesDemonstrated knowledge about one or more areas of machine-learning and analysis of large datasetsStrong analytical, oral, and writing skills', 'Involvement in critical partnerships projects with pharmaceutical clients', 'We are looking for an exceptional data science software engineer to join our team. The preferred candidate will bring relevant experience, entrepreneurial drive, and a passion for advancing our vision.', 'ReviveMed is an MIT spinout, artificial intelligence (AI)-driven drug discovery platform by uniquely leveraging data form small molecules or metabolites in the human body. Located in the heart of biotech innovation in Cambridge, ReviveMed uniquely overcomes the difficulties of identifying a large set of metabolites for each patient, based on technology that our team developed at MIT and published in Nature Methods. Our AI platform further combines the data from small molecules with other molecular data, and translates these data into novel therapeutic insights for drug discovery. Currently, ReviveMed is collaborating with tier-one pharmaceutical companies and pursuing internal drug discovery, initially focused on metabolic diseases, including non-alcoholic fatty liver.', 'The company', 'Opportunities for personal and professional growth as our company expands', 'Extensive experiences with cloud computing platforms including AWS and GCP', 'Qualifications ', 'Proven programming skills: We use Python along with shell scripts, R, SQL, and other programming languages as needed.', '\xa0', 'An opportunity to learn about the applications of advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to drug discovery and development from the beginning', 'Why you should join ReviveMed', 'Strong analytical, oral, and writing skills', 'Self-motivated, highly disciplined, and passionate about saving lives with every line of code', 'The Role', 'PhD or MS degree in Computer Science or related fields; 2-5 years of work experience preferred, but we will consider strong candidates with less experience', 'Experience building new solutions using Docker and the Kubernetes container orchestration', 'An opportunity to learn about the applications of advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to drug discovery and development from the beginningInvolvement in critical partnerships projects with pharmaceutical clientsOpportunities for personal and professional growth as our company expandsCompetitive compensation, health insurance, as well as share optionsMaking an impact on the world with every line of code', 'Competitive compensation, health insurance, as well as share options', 'Making an impact on the world with every line of code', 'Demonstrated knowledge about one or more areas of machine-learning and analysis of large datasets']

', ' Create standards around common metrics and calculations ', " This position may be filled 100% remote. Job Summary：We are looking for a data analyst to help support and grow the data and analytics environment in the Residential space for Trane Technologies. The ideal candidate has a passion for all things data and the desire to share their knowledge to raise the capabilities of the self-service analytics community. The analyst will gain or deepen knowledge of the residential data in the shared workspace. They will guide users to the right data, help ensure conformity with naming conventions and calculations, and help track existing reports, workflows and tables. They will also contribute to a growing analytics culture.Responsibilities  Possess deep knowledge of Trane Technologies Residential data sources in order to advise analysts on appropriate use.   Collaborate with the business to understand analytics use cases and consult on best approach.   Create standards around common metrics and calculations   Develop training materials to support self-service data discovery, workflow development and dashboard development.   Provide first tier break/fix support for data source issues.   Coach self-service analysts on creating data sets for analytics and reporting.   Provide consultation on best practice visualization techniques for a consistent look and feel for dashboards and improved ease of use for the consumers of the visualization.   May perform some data set or visualization development that the business will maintain.   Oversee Tableau environment for Residential and provide recommendations for organizational principles.   Perform QA of own work and others work, trouble-shoot errors and fix problems before they leave the team.   Engage with data engineers on data sources that need to be improved or added   Participate in agile process with the team, and act as scrum master on a rotational basis.   Qualifications:  BS/BA in technical or analytics related field   3+ years experience in Tableau   3+ years experience in Alteryx, SQL   Knowledge of big data tools, PySpark, Python, and/or R preferred.   Proficient in Microsoft products, Excel and PowerPoint   Willing to learn new tools and coding languages to grow into the data space   Proven communication skills with technical and business audiences.   Tenacity to work through complex data sets, changing business requirements, and evolving corporate environment a must. We are proud of our winning culture which is inclusive and respectful at its core. We share passion for serving customers, caring for others, and boldly challenging what's possible for a sustainable world.We are committed to achieving workforce diversity reflective of our communities. We are an equal opportunity employer. job_text: ['', 'Cloud: Operating in AWS (S3, Lamda, Redshift, ECS/EC2, RDS)', 'Languages: Golang, Scala, Python, C++, Java', 'You have experience designing and owning technical solutions and you are comfortable being polyglot. We are particularly looking for Go experience with Python, C++ and/or Java. You are keen to learn and have faced similar technical challenges (distributed systems, data processing, microservices, on prem vs cloud etc). You own your own code and comfortable with testing, CICD pipelines and automated monitoring/alerting You champion automation and focus on doing fewer things, faster and better. You are all about continuous improvements on the product you build on and your own professional development. You challenge others to be better, welcome new ideas, and advocate for the best solution. You believe in collaboration through transparency, strong communication, and that diversity makes a team stronger. ['', 'Great sense of ownership and attention to detail.', 'Enhance our simulation, optimization, and prediction capabilities.', 'Ability to communicate complex quantitative matters in a clear, precise, and actionable manner.\xa0', 'Please note: LeanTaaS is not accepting agency resumes at this time, and we are not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes. Thank you.', 'Excellent collaboration skills with cross-functional species like product managers, data engineers, and data analysts.', 'Requirements', 'Responsibilities', 'Advanced degree in operations research, machine learning, or a related field and 2+ years of related industry or academic experience.', 'Advanced degree in operations research, machine learning, or a related field and 2+ years of related industry or academic experience.Strong analytical and problem solving skills and a deep understanding in at least one sub-area of operations research or machine learning.Proven command on Python and SQL and are passionate about writing readable code.Excellent collaboration skills with cross-functional species like product managers, data engineers, and data analysts.Ability to communicate complex quantitative matters in a clear, precise, and actionable manner.\xa0Great sense of ownership and attention to detail.', 'Work in a small data science team imbedded into one of our product verticals.', 'Make sense of complex electronic health record (EHR) data related to surgeries, doctors, patients, etc. and help us derive greater value from our data.', 'Strong analytical and problem solving skills and a deep understanding in at least one sub-area of operations research or machine learning.', 'LeanTaaS develops software that increases patient access to medical care by optimizing how health systems use expensive, constrained resources like infusion chairs, operating rooms, and inpatient beds. More than 100 health systems and 300 hospitals – including 5 of the 10 largest systems, 12 of US News and World Report’s top 20 hospitals, 70% of all National Comprehensive Cancer Network institutions, and 55% of all National Cancer Institute locations – rely on the company’s iQueue cloud-based platform to increase patient access, decrease wait times, and reduce healthcare delivery costs. The HIPAA-compliant, non-invasive cloud-based SaaS platform – iQueue for Infusion Centers, iQueue for Operating Rooms, and iQueue for Inpatient Beds – coexists with current EHR systems and integrates seamlessly with existing scheduling and operational workflows.\xa0', 'This role is based in Santa Clara, CA and is not a remote position.', 'Proven command on Python and SQL and are passionate about writing readable code.', 'Own your projects end-to-end including a technology stack, data consumption, modeling, algorithm development and evaluation, and production deployment.', 'Work in a small data science team imbedded into one of our product verticals.Make sense of complex electronic health record (EHR) data related to surgeries, doctors, patients, etc. and help us derive greater value from our data.Enhance our simulation, optimization, and prediction capabilities.Own your projects end-to-end including a technology stack, data consumption, modeling, algorithm development and evaluation, and production deployment.Wear a product hat to ideate and iterate on features and experiences that allow your users to run hospitals like a clock.', 'Wear a product hat to ideate and iterate on features and experiences that allow your users to run hospitals like a clock.']

['Experience with service-oriented architecture\xa0', 'Job Summary:\xa0', 'Strong software design and architecture skills\xa0', '\xa0\xa0', 'Incorporated in 2008, Boku is one of the world’s leading providers of carrier billing and mobile identity solutions. Using nothing more than a user’s mobile phone, Boku’s technology can verify a user’s identity, execute a payment, or provision a new service, radically simplifying common, everyday mobile interactions between consumers and businesses. This is possible because Boku’s platform can access the internal billing, identity, and sales systems of mobile operators globally. Businesses who utilize Boku’s platform include major brands such as Apple, Google, Microsoft, Sony, Facebook, Spotify, Netflix,\xa0Paypal, Experian, Fiserv, Western Union, Uber, and Discover. Boku was originally financed through top-tier investors including Andreessen Horowitz, Benchmark, DAG Ventures, Index Ventures, Khosla Ventures and NEA. Today, Boku is publicly traded on the AIM Market of the London Stock Exchange (AIM: BOKU.L)\xa0', "An ability to think through customer's pain points and requirements and to come up with a simple, elegant solution\xa0", 'What you will do:\xa0', 'Meet eligibility requirements to work in the US\xa0', 'Work hands-on with a highly skilled team of Engineers and Product Managers to ideate, build, and improve Boku payment products and features\xa0', 'We’re looking for someone who has:\xa0', 'We’re a small company, but we have a global reach. We work face-to-face with colleagues and collaborate across disciplines. But our clients, partners and operations are all over the world. Boku is a busy, exciting, and demanding place to work, but it’s the people that make the company. The mix of cultures, viewpoints, and experiences are vital for a global company like ours and every person’s contribution is valued. If you are looking for a new challenge in an exciting, innovative and international working environment, we are the ideal company for you.\xa0', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills to document and explain technical design, best practices, and integration guide to both technical and non-technical audiences.\xa0', 'Participate in all phases of the software development lifecycle, including design, development, testing and release\xa0', "The Payments Product team at Boku is expanding and we are looking for an experienced Software Engineer to join us. This position is based in the San Francisco Bay Area. As part of the Payments Product team, you will be responsible for end-to-end development of our payment products and features. You will be challenged with building scalable, customizable, and frictionless checkout experience for millions of Boku's customers around the world.\xa0", 'Experience building and maintaining high-volume, customer-facing product in the cloud (AWS, GCP,\xa0etc).\xa0', 'Bonus points:\xa0', 'Experience with some (or all) of the following technologies/frameworks/tools: Maven, Git, MySQL, JMS, Spring, JPA/Hibernate, Jersey, Jetty, Kubernetes.\xa0', 'Own the products that you build, become the domain expert, and be actively involved in strategic direction and product decisions\xa0', 'Hands-on software development experience in Java.\xa0', 'Ability to work collaboratively and effectively with cross-functional teams: Product Management, Quality Assurance, Finance, Merchant Onboarding, etc.\xa0', 'Mentors and coaches’ other engineers\xa0', 'Experience using agile methodologies and tools\xa0', '3+ years of experience shipping high-quality products\xa0', 'About Boku:\xa0', 'Sharing knowledge and drive best practices across the Engineering teams by giving brown bags, writing article,\xa0etc\xa0', 'Experience integrating with third party web services across a variety of technologies,\xa0e.g.\xa0REST, SOAP, SMPP\xa0']

['', 'Knowledge of relational databases (e.g.MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (e.g. MongoDB)', "This individual will produce and implement functional software solutions. translate into strong software designWorks in close consultation with engineering teams to implement process control and monitoring solutionsAssist in development and maintenance of a Monitoring and Management system application, including validation and troubleshootingEnsure designs meet scalability and reliability standards.Document design solutions and implement according to the design guidelinesAssist in risk assessment and mitigation activitiesMake business presentations to management when neededDevelop, test, deploy, and support of the assigned featuresIntegrate industry best practices and standards in all project requirementsIdentify opportunities for process improvements/efficiencies and drive adoption of high priority/high value improvements within the teamProvide technical assistance to other departments and production support as neededAccurately scope projects with minimal supervision and ensure timely project releases', 'Document design solutions and implement according to the design guidelines', 'Principal Software Engineer ', 'Bloom faces an unprecedented opportunity to change the world and the way companies utilize energy. Our mission is to make clean, reliable energy affordable globally. Bloom’s Energy Server, delivers highly reliable and resilient, always-on electric power that is clean, cost-effective, and ideal for micro grid applications. This role will be remote while COVID restrictions are in place. The expectation is to be onsite at our Customer’s Beaverton, OR location once it is deemed safe to do so.', '• Understanding and experience in one or more Hot Skill Technology (Java, .net, SAP, PeopleSoft, See Beyond).', '• Proficient with DevOps, modern build strategies, continuous integration, unit testing, and automated integration tests', '• Manage and enforce performance thresholds and standards.', '• Ability to define solutions, provide estimates of effort and risk, and evaluate technical feasibility', '• Experience with Spring framework and Spring Boot', '• Allocate resources based on performance monitoring and tuning results.', 'Opportunity: The Mom Project is helping to source candidates for the above client who is looking for a Senior Software Engineer', '• Approves proof of concept efforts and reviews results.', '• Defines and communicates requirements for technical environments and determines the technical scope for projects.', '• Enforces architecture, governance, security, and global process standards to system changes and deployments.', '• Resolves issues and determines options for issue resolution and risk mitigation.', "• Manages employees, sets goals, coach's staff, supports development, collaborates on hiring decisions, disciplinary actions, performance management, and recognition, and rewards.", 'Our Customer’s mission is to create groundbreaking sport innovations, by making their products more sustainable, building a creative and diverse global team, and making a positive impact in communities where we live and work. Their purpose is to bring inspiration and innovation to unite the world through sport to create a healthy planet, active communities, and an equal playing field for all.', '• Enforce department architectural direction and ensure consistent technical approach within department.', 'Company Industry:\xa0Retail', '• Proficient in pair programming and performing technical code reviews', 'Opportunity:', 'We are seeking a Software Engineer on a contract basis to innovate and lead in the Digital space and join the Digital Engineering organization. They bring together technology and process expertise to deliver innovative, seamless solutions that enable digital products and services to reach millions of consumers through their brand.', 'Company Industry:', 'Hours & Location:', '• Strong team player and communicator capable of building positive relationships across engineering, product, and architecture', '• Solid foundation in data structures, algorithms and architecture patterns', '• Leads and owns engagements with software vendors to ensure that code and configuration requirements and deliverables are met.', '• Develops action plans and processes, in coordination with the management team, for integrating activities and optimizing department resources to meet major goals and objectives.', '• Review and approve performance test results, recommendations, and tuning results.', '• Experience with NoSQL data stores to ensure data storage is designed for security, reliability, availability, maintainability, and performance', 'Health Benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision, Life (including spouse & child), 401k, STD/LTD, AD&D, and Commuter Benefits program.', 'What you’ll do:', '• Contributes Collaborates with other teams on integration needs/design.', 'Now for the Perks!', '• Provides technical estimates for project budget input to Senior/Project Manager.', '• Hands-on experience working in a distributed/cloud-based environment (AWS preferred) with high transaction volumes', 'Commitment Level: 40 hours per week, 100% remote, contract through June 2021', '• Contributes to database design and creates critical-path, high-risk, advanced technical designs.', '• Working knowledge of Scrum and agile principles', '• Oversee and is responsible for the creation of test plans, test execution, and validation of test results.', 'As a Software Engineer in Marketplace Platforms, you will join a team of engineers, scrum masters, and product owners to envision and deliver robust applications and services that bring omni-channel solutions to the next level. This role will be involved in designing and building secure, highly scalable, and innovative services in a continuous delivery model on the cloud platform. The Senior Software Engineer will also partner with leads and architects to establish a technical vision for various commerce experiences.', '• 3+ years’ experience using Java (8+ preferred)']

['', 'What would you do in this role?\xa0', 'The Motley Fool has been twice named Glassdoor’s #1 Best Small Business to work for in the U.S., named to Inc.’s Best Workplaces of 2020, named one of BuiltIn’s Best Places to Work in Colorado, and we’re a perennial favorite on Washingtonian’s list of Best Places to Work year after year. Below you’ll see a few of our perks, but check outthis site\xa0for the complete list:\xa0', '$1,000 to invest when you start', 'We are\xa0The Motley Fool, a purpose-driven financial services firm with nearly 30 years of expertise. Our goal is to make the world smarter, happier,andricher by providing outstanding business and investing advice, at scale. But what does that even mean?! It means we’re helping Fools (always with a capital “F”) demystify the world of finance, beat the stock market, and achieve personal wealth and happiness through our investing services, likeStock Advisor, andMotley Fool Wealth Management, our portfolio management service.\xa0\xa0', 'You take pride in your work:\xa0The thought of a customer seeing a 500 error page keeps you up at night. When a member cancels, it brings a tear to your eye. You want to ensure that every customer has a great experience with The Motley Fool because of what you build.', 'Availability for production support.', 'Ability to debug at all levels of the stack.', 'You’re curious and love to learn:', 'You take pride in your work:', 'Comprehensive compensation package, including company equity', 'As a\xa0Senior Software Developer, you’ll be working on a fast paced team responsible for the code that powers our ultimate goal of helping people invest their hard-earned cash more effectively and profitably. Successful Fools have well-formed opinions (stemming from their broad experience) and have the talent to remix those ideas with others in awesome ways.', 'Senior Software Developer', 'You pay attention to detail:\xa0', 'actually\xa0', 'You solve problems:\xa0You spot issues and inefficiencies from a mile away and aren’t afraid to suggest solutions and then dive in to implement them. ["Candidates must possess minimum of a Bachelor degree in computer science and\xa0six years' direct experience OR Associate degree or certificate in computer science or directly related field AND\xa0eight years' direct experience; knowledge of structured systems analysis, design techniques, programming, and coding; knowledge of a systems development life-cycle methodology and an ability to work effectively within that framework; demonstrated skill in\xa0several development platforms used at MBG; capacity to learn new technologies; ability to make independent judgments and use own discretion; ability to establish and nurture positive working relationships with peers, management and business partners; proficient interpersonal relations and communications skills (both written and verbal); strong customer service orientation; demonstrated ability to conceptualize, analyze, and resolve problems within required timeframes; an eye for detail; and experience in setting schedules and meeting deadlines.", "The title of senior software engineer is a senior-level role for those individuals with expert knowledge and skills obtained through employment as a software engineer (or similar duties) and have six to eight years' direct experience.\xa0To be hired at or move into this tier, the incumbent must demonstrate skills in at least two development platforms used by Mutual Benefit Group.", "Candidates must also possess at least five years' heavy experience in iSeries/IBM i\xa0using RPG, CL, COBOL, and DB2;\xa0and experience with technologies, tools, utilities, and packages including Query400, SDA, PDM, DFU, Websphere,\xa0and Systemi Navigator.", 'The senior software engineer\xa0works with the business community to understand and translate complex business requirements into functional specifications for developing and modifying data processing systems.\xa0Evaluates operational systems and recommends improvements.\xa0Produces detailed programming specifications for logical, economical, and practical systems designs.\xa0Writes, modifies, and tests programs thoroughly.\xa0Makes formal presentations and assists with programming training.\xa0Provides guidance to junior-level personnel on analysis and programming duties.\xa0A senior software engineer receives assignments of increasing complexity from the software development and engineering manager, software development manager, or project manager and performs responsibilities with minimal supervision.\xa0Factors that determine level of complexity include: size and scope of the assignment, level of leadership expected, number of system integration points, use of new technology, complexity of the business problem being solved, etc.']

or Master's degree.", 'General Dynamics Mission Systems (GDMS) engineers a diverse portfolio of high technology solutions, products and services that enable customers to successfully execute missions across all domains of operation.\xa0 With a global team of 13,000+ top professionals, we partner with the best in industry to expand the bounds of innovation in the defense and scientific arenas.\xa0 Given the nature of our work and who we are, we value trust, honesty, alignment and transparency.\xa0 We offer highly competitive benefits and pride ourselves in being a great place to work with a shared sense of purpose. \xa0You will also enjoy a flexible work environment where contributions are recognized and rewarded.\xa0 If who we are and what we do resonates with you, we invite you to join our high performance team!', 'The ability to take an existing network topology, improve upon it, and put the architecture into practice.', 'Cisco CCT, CCNA or more advanced certifications.Experience employing COMSEC in network design.Updating firmware and security hardening network equipment.Experience configuration Cisco Routers and Cisco FirewallsExperience implement Virtual Local Area Networks (VLAN)Experience documenting network topologiesLinux system administration experience deploying services like TFTP, DHCP, NTP, SSH, etc.Configuring Virtual Private NetworksDesigning and Implementing firewall rulesets.', 'Designing and Implementing firewall rulesets.', 'General Dynamics is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer that is committed to hiring a diverse and talented workforce.\xa0 EOE/Disability/Veteran', 'CLEARANCE REQUIREMENTS:Department of Defense secret security clearance is obtainable within a reasonable of time. Applicants selected will be subject to a U.S. Government security investigation and must meet eligibility requirements for access to classified information. Due to the nature of work performed within our facilities, U.S. citizenship is required.', 'CLEARANCE REQUIREMENTS:', '\xa0', 'Experience implement Virtual Local Area Networks (VLAN)', 'General Dynamics Mission Systems has an immediate opening for a Network Engineer', 'Ability to handle more complex assignments and grasps and apply new information quickly.Ability to research the requisite steps to accomplish a task; understanding that time spent solving a problem is time spent honing and improving an existing skillset.Experience with subnetting, designing and implementing simple networks.The ability to take an existing network topology, improve upon it, and put the architecture into practice.Experience configuring Later 2 and Layer 3 Cisco switches with users, routes, remote access, VLANs, LACP groups, etc.Eager to learn, grow and try new networking technologies and architectures.Support and assist in the design and planning of network systems.', 'Configuring Virtual Private Networks', 'Experience with subnetting, designing and implementing simple networks.', 'Updating firmware and security hardening network equipment.', 'Experience documenting network topologies', 'The Network Engineer provides technical analysis in data network planning, engineering and design, and implements techniques and tools to improve the network. This engineer will also be responsible for conducting maintenance on existing networks using existing documentation and artifacts. The engineer coordinates with stakeholders to provide maintenance and troubleshoot hardware interconnection and interfacing, such as switches, routers, firewalls, etc. This engineer is motivated and does what it takes to get the job done, even if that requires research in areas that unfamiliar.', 'Ability to handle more complex assignments and grasps and apply new information quickly.', 'Experience configuration Cisco Routers and Cisco Firewalls', 'Cisco CCT, CCNA or more advanced certifications.', 'Eager to learn, grow and try new networking technologies and architectures.']

job_title: Senior Product Manager- Data Platform Suite
job_text: ['', ' Excellent written and verbal communications across technical and non-technical stakeholders ', ' Define a set of KPIs to measure customer satisfaction and business impact with the ability to analyze them and utilize them in decision making processes. ', ' Integrate analytics, data science and research into your methodology. ', ' Experience in product management, product development, and in shipping quality products that delivered business impact and customer satisfaction ', ' An influencer of product and people ', ' Passionate about working with other businesses and product stakeholders to solve their specific challenges while putting customer trust and experience first ', '  3 years of experience as an Engineer, Web Developer, Data Scientist, or Analyst required   Bachelor’s or Master’s in Engineering, STEM, or Business Administration preferred   Minimum of 5+ years of experience preferred, ideally 3+ years in a technical role and 2+ years in a Product Management role   Experience in product management, product development, and in shipping quality products that delivered business impact and customer satisfaction   Has demonstrated a strong product delivery process through iteration   Experience drafting Product Requirement Documents, User Stories, and Backlogs   An influencer of product and people   Demonstrates an undeniable focus on the customer, always striving to understand their wants/needs   Passionate about working with other businesses and product stakeholders to solve their specific challenges while putting customer trust and experience first   Proven history of converting learnings from customer insights into tangible product features that customers love   Entrepreneurial instincts with clear bias for informed action and track record of leading new initiatives   Strong analytical and quantitative skills with ability to use data and metrics for making assumptions and decisions   Ability to successfully work with cross-functional teams including engineering, operations, sales, and marketing   Excellent written and verbal communications across technical and non-technical stakeholders   Capable of using modern web data tools   Understanding of the engineering development process   Previous experience with Agile/Scrum Methodology   Experience with Product insight and roadmapping tools like Aha, Product Plan, Jira, ProductBoard, Craft, etc.   Good understanding and working experience in technology development best practices (such as, Agile, etc.) and product management technologies, preferred   Product development or management experience in Data, Signal Processing, or Machine Learning space/industry preferred   Experience presenting to senior executives, preferred   Experience at high-growth technology startup companies or another fast-paced environment, preferred not required', ' Help define and deliver a product vision and strategy. ', ' Experience presenting to senior executives, preferred ', ' Work directly with customers to understand their pain points and disseminate customer empathy across all product stakeholders, including our Deliverable Team that uses these tools to process this big data. ', ' Capable of using modern web data tools ', ' Good understanding and working experience in technology development best practices (such as, Agile, etc.) and product management technologies, preferred ', ' Experience at high-growth technology startup companies or another fast-paced environment, preferred not required', ' Experience drafting Product Requirement Documents, User Stories, and Backlogs ', ' Minimum of 5+ years of experience preferred, ideally 3+ years in a technical role and 2+ years in a Product Management role ', ' Perform competitive analysis and value proposition differentiation. ', ' Demonstrates an undeniable focus on the customer, always striving to understand their wants/needs ', ' Help internal technical product teams ruthlessly prioritize product features and influence their backlogs. ', ' Has demonstrated a strong product delivery process through iteration ', ' Define, document and communicate customer use cases, scenarios and needs. ', '  Help define and deliver a product vision and strategy.   Work directly with customers to understand their pain points and disseminate customer empathy across all product stakeholders, including our Deliverable Team that uses these tools to process this big data.   Define, document and communicate customer use cases, scenarios and needs.   Help internal technical product teams ruthlessly prioritize product features and influence their backlogs.   Work with engineering and business stakeholders including operations, finance, sales and business development to deliver business specific value.   Engage at a deep technical level with partners to understand their roadmap and its potential impact on our customers.   Inform and educate stakeholders on existing and future functionality.   Maximize productivity in a constantly changing environment of shifting priorities.   Perform competitive analysis and value proposition differentiation.   Define a set of KPIs to measure customer satisfaction and business impact with the ability to analyze them and utilize them in decision making processes.   Integrate analytics, data science and research into your methodology.  ', ' Ability to successfully work with cross-functional teams including engineering, operations, sales, and marketing ', ' Maximize productivity in a constantly changing environment of shifting priorities. ', ' Entrepreneurial instincts with clear bias for informed action and track record of leading new initiatives ', ' Work with engineering and business stakeholders including operations, finance, sales and business development to deliver business specific value. ', ' 3 years of experience as an Engineer, Web Developer, Data Scientist, or Analyst required ', ' Strong analytical and quantitative skills with ability to use data and metrics for making assumptions and decisions ', ' Experience with Product insight and roadmapping tools like Aha, Product Plan, Jira, ProductBoard, Craft, etc. ', ' Bachelor’s or Master’s in Engineering, STEM, or Business Administration preferred ', ' Engage at a deep technical level with partners to understand their roadmap and its potential impact on our customers. ', ' Understanding of the engineering development process ', ' Previous experience with Agile/Scrum Methodology ', ' Product development or management experience in Data, Signal Processing, or Machine Learning space/industry preferred ']

job_title: Staff Software Engineer, Product and Customer Solutions
job_text: ['', 'A10 Networks is an equal opportunity employer and a VEVRAA federal subcontractor. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. A10 also complies with all applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment.', 'Validate current solutions and implementations against new threats (or new types of attack).', 'Are you up for the challenge? Join us and make your impact on the future as our\xa0Network Engineer, located in our office in Cary, NC.\xa0', 'Understand customers’ security infrastructure designs and implementations; join internal discussions to ensure best protection solution for customers’ scenarios.', 'Interface with account team on recommended strategies.', 'Understand DDoS well and be an expert on all protection techniques and offerings.Stay on top of latest attacks, vulnerabilities, and trends.Research and provide best mitigation practices using company product for various deployment scenarios.Develop feature enhancements, new mitigation techniques, and fixes based on of field / attack', 'Work with key customers on the following:', 'Write production code that will improve our internal tooling and our external support channels', 'Participate in planning, design, implementation, test, and maintenance of critical or prospective mitigation solutions.Interface with account team on recommended strategies.Work with key customers on the following:Optimize product deployment and implementation efforts for customers.Validate current solutions and implementations against new threats (or new types of attack).Write production code that will improve our internal tooling and our external support channelsBe synchronized with customers’ architecture design details on API compatibility and automation to ensure smooth deployment of new products and product releases.Understand customers’ security infrastructure designs and implementations; join internal discussions to ensure best protection solution for customers’ scenarios.', 'Responsibilities', 'Be synchronized with customers’ architecture design details on API compatibility and automation to ensure smooth deployment of new products and product releases.', 'Strong networking experience especially in L4/L7 protocols, and hands-on development experience in Linux.', 'Network Engineer', 'Stay on top of latest attacks, vulnerabilities, and trends.', 'Strong coding background in Network Related Appliance or System.', 'A10 Networks (NYSE: ATEN), a leading provider of intelligent and automated cybersecurity solutions, delivers Reliable Security Always™, with a range of high-performance application networking solutions that help organizations ensure that their applications and networks remain highly available, accelerated and secure. The company routinely wins innovation awards, underscoring it product and market leadership. Founded in 2004, A10 Networks is based in San Jose, Calif., and serves its valued customers globally with offices worldwide.', 'Develop feature enhancements, new mitigation techniques, and fixes based on of field / attack', 'Required Experience', 'Research and provide best mitigation practices using company product for various deployment scenarios.', 'Experience and working knowledge with any of the following: NGFW, Intrusion Detection and Prevention (IDP), Deep Packet Inspection (DPI), URL, Filtering, malware protection systems, and Web application firewall.', 'Optimize product deployment and implementation efforts for customers.', 'BS plus 5+ years or MS plus 3+ years in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent.Strong coding background in Network Related Appliance or System.Advanced knowledge in the following languages: C, C++, PythonStrong networking experience especially in L4/L7 protocols, and hands-on development experience in Linux.Knowledge of BGP routing protocols and associated usage or automation.', '       practices.', 'Advanced knowledge in the following languages: C, C++, Python', 'Strong DDoS mitigation exposureExperience and working knowledge with any of the following: NGFW, Intrusion Detection and Prevention (IDP), Deep Packet Inspection (DPI), URL, Filtering, malware protection systems, and Web application firewall.Experience with Automation Techniques and Scripting Languages', 'Participate in planning, design, implementation, test, and maintenance of critical or prospective mitigation solutions.', 'Strong DDoS mitigation exposure', 'Desirable Skills', 'BS plus 5+ years or MS plus 3+ years in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent.', 'Understand DDoS well and be an expert on all protection techniques and offerings.', 'Knowledge of BGP routing protocols and associated usage or automation.', 'Experience with Automation Techniques and Scripting Languages']

job_title: Hardware System Reliability Engineer, Consumer Hardware
job_text: ['', "Bachelor's degree in Electrical/Mechanical Engineering, or Materials Science or equivalent practical experience. ", 'Translate test results into meaningful product life metrics and highlight shortcomings on any metrics not met', 'Experience with Python, MATLAB, LabVIEW or other programming languages for data analysis and hardware test.', 'About The Job', ' Master’s degree or PhD in Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering or Materials Science. Experience working with overseas manufacturing partners. Experience with failure analysis techniques for electrical, mechanical or optical components. Experience with Python, MATLAB, LabVIEW or other programming languages for data analysis and hardware test. ', ' Understand technology driving various sensors modules, develop reliability tests and requirements to bring out design weaknesses of critical sensors and other modules Develop acceleration models and accelerated tests Establish and lead module level DFR (Design for Reliability) activities such as Fault Tree Analysis and Design Failure Modes and Effects Analysis, design and apply DOEs (Design Of experiments) Translate test results into meaningful product life metrics and highlight shortcomings on any metrics not met Collaborate and work synergistically with external vendors and internal product design,design teams, system reliability, quality engineers and FA teams to de-risk, drive root cause and implement necessary corrective actions ', 'Responsibilities', " Bachelor's degree in Electrical/Mechanical Engineering, or Materials Science or equivalent practical experience.  3 years of experience with reliability or quality engineering or similar  Statistical analysis experience including Monte Carlo Analysis, DoE, SPC, Gage R&R. Experience in applying design for reliability techniques (FTA, DFMEA) and reliability modeling techniques ", 'Statistical analysis experience including Monte Carlo Analysis, DoE, SPC, Gage R&R.', '3 years of experience with reliability or quality engineering or similar ', 'Establish and lead module level DFR (Design for Reliability) activities such as Fault Tree Analysis and Design Failure Modes and Effects Analysis, design and apply DOEs (Design Of experiments)', 'Master’s degree or PhD in Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering or Materials Science.', 'Develop acceleration models and accelerated tests', 'Experience working with overseas manufacturing partners.', 'Experience in applying design for reliability techniques (FTA, DFMEA) and reliability modeling techniques', 'Understand technology driving various sensors modules, develop reliability tests and requirements to bring out design weaknesses of critical sensors and other modules', 'Experience with failure analysis techniques for electrical, mechanical or optical components.', 'Collaborate and work synergistically with external vendors and internal product design,design teams, system reliability, quality engineers and FA teams to de-risk, drive root cause and implement necessary corrective actions']

job_title: Azure AI Engineer, Senior, Tech Consulting
job_text: ['', 'If you can confidently demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.', 'Developing and maintaining long-term client relationships and networks.', 'Hands-on experience with AI technologies within Microsoft and Azure ecosystems, with experiences in tools such as Azure Cognitive Services, Azure Bot Services (Microsoft Bot Framework), LUIS, QnA Maker, Azure App Service. Knowledge of integrating experiences with Azure Machine Learning service and Azure Databricks is a plus.', 'Supporting the strategy, planning, and implementation of AI services, providing sizing and configuration assistance and performing needs assessments.', 'Experience leveraging a variety of services to act as data sources such as Azure Data Lake, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure SQL, Azure EventHub/IoT Hub, etc.', 'Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career', 'Communication is essential, must be able to listen and understand the question and develop and deliver clear insights.', 'Effectively managing and motivating client engagement teams with diverse skills and backgrounds. Providing constructive on-the-job feedback/coaching to team members. ', ' Knowledge and experience with Model Management, ideally using Azure ML service Knowledge and experience with one or more cloud available Machine Learning frameworks and tools such as Tensor Flow, PyTorch, ONNX, Weka, NumPy, PyMongo, etc. Knowledge of Recommendation engines, scoring systems, A/B testing MS Certifications Azure AI Engineer Associate, Azure Fundamentals ', 'Ability to conduct data profiling, cataloguing, and data mapping for technical design using a use case-based approach that drives the construction of technical data flows.', 'Knowledge and experience with Model Management, ideally using Azure ML service', 'Skills And Attributes For Success', 'What Working At EY Offers', ' Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career A collaborative environment where everyone works together to create a better working world  Excellent training and development prospects, both through established programs and on-the-job training  ', " Translating business requirements to technical solutions leveraging strong business acumen. Assisting in the strategy and implementation of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science driven experiences.  Collaborating with Microsoft Cloud Solution Architects and Data Platform Engineers in developing complex end-to-end Enterprise solutions on Microsoft Azure platform. Supporting the strategy, planning, and implementation of AI services, providing sizing and configuration assistance and performing needs assessments. Ability to conduct data profiling, cataloguing, and data mapping for technical design using a use case-based approach that drives the construction of technical data flows. The ability to apply such methods to solve business problems using one or more Azure Data and Analytics services in combination with designing and building AI experiences tailored for a client use case.  Staying abreast of current business and industry trends relevant to the client's business Developing and maintaining long-term client relationships and networks. Participating in large-scale client engagements. Fostering relationships with client personnel at appropriate levels. Consistently delivering quality client services. Driving high-quality work products within expected timeframes and on budget.  Monitoring progress, managing risk and ensuring key stakeholders are kept informed about progress and expected outcomes.  Managing expectations of client service delivery.  Effectively managing and motivating client engagement teams with diverse skills and backgrounds. Providing constructive on-the-job feedback/coaching to team members.  Fostering an innovative and inclusive team-oriented work environment. Playing an active role in counselling and mentoring junior consultants within the organization ", 'About EY', 'A valid driver’s license in the US; willingness and ability to travel to meet client needs.', 'The ability to apply such methods to solve business problems using one or more Azure Data and Analytics services in combination with designing and building AI experiences tailored for a client use case. ', 'A collaborative environment where everyone works together to create a better working world ', 'Your Key Responsibilities', 'Assisting in the strategy and implementation of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science driven experiences. ', 'Knowledge of Recommendation engines, scoring systems, A/B testing', 'At least three years of professional consulting experience in AI and data science with specific experience building virtual agents, chatbots, and other AI driven experiences. Experience with data engineering is a plus.', ' Bachelor’s degree, or MS degree in Computer Science, Informatics, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Data Science, or Machine Learning.  At least three years of professional consulting experience in AI and data science with specific experience building virtual agents, chatbots, and other AI driven experiences. Experience with data engineering is a plus. Hands-on experience with AI technologies within Microsoft and Azure ecosystems, with experiences in tools such as Azure Cognitive Services, Azure Bot Services (Microsoft Bot Framework), LUIS, QnA Maker, Azure App Service. Knowledge of integrating experiences with Azure Machine Learning service and Azure Databricks is a plus. Experience leveraging a variety of services to act as data sources such as Azure Data Lake, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure SQL, Azure EventHub/IoT Hub, etc. Thorough business understanding of AI-driven applications and the ability to communicate with key decision-makers Deep understanding of statistical modeling, natural language processing, and AI driven experience design Extensive experience connecting to Data Platforms including data lakes, data warehouses, NoSQL databases, and APIs. Fundamental understanding of ETL, data ingestion/cleansing Communication is essential, must be able to listen and understand the question and develop and deliver clear insights. Outstanding team player. Independent and able to manage and prioritize workload. Ability to quickly and positively adapt to change. A valid driver’s license in the US; willingness and ability to travel to meet client needs. ', 'To qualify for the role you must have', 'Extensive experience connecting to Data Platforms including data lakes, data warehouses, NoSQL databases, and APIs.', 'What We Look For', 'Monitoring progress, managing risk and ensuring key stakeholders are kept informed about progress and expected outcomes. Playing an active role in counselling and mentoring junior consultants within the organization', 'Bachelor’s degree, or MS degree in Computer Science, Informatics, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Data Science, or Machine Learning. ', 'Participating in large-scale client engagements. Fostering relationships with client personnel at appropriate levels. Consistently delivering quality client services. ['', 'Interacting with developers and support to define and prioritize focus.', 'Professional Development Program', 'Building cost effective solutions by analyzing and creating opportunity for data driven decision making.', 'Competitive compensation packageMedical, Dental, Vision & Disability InsuranceWellness ProgramsPet InsuranceRetirement PlanningCompany EquityGenerous Paid Parental LeaveWork From Home SetupEmployee Referral ProgramDiscretionary Time OffFriendly & Casual EnvironmentWork/Life BalanceProfessional Development Program', 'Respond to production issues on an on-call basis.', 'Experience with enterprise networking and security in the cloud', '10+ years of experience in a Systems Engineer or DevOps role', 'Deep experience with Elasticsearch', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex or national origin.', 'Using best practice automation and documentation as an enabler for resiliency.', 'Mentoring your peers in best practice methods.', 'Competitive compensation package', 'Discretionary Time Off', 'At Kenna You Can Enjoy The Following', 'Enabling the transition to containers and fully immutable infrastructure.', 'Production usage of Docker, Kubernetes', 'We’re looking for an experienced Sr. Systems Engineer who will be responsible for the architecture, building and maintenance of the infrastructure that runs the Kenna Platform. You will help push the constant evolution of the platform towards the best scaling, quality & security standards of modern cloud native solutions.', 'There are a lot of security companies out there, but no one is doing what Kenna is doing: giving our customers the ability to measure their risk landscape and truly protect their environments from the ever-present threat of a breach. As a result, we’re seeing phenomenal growth as some of the top companies in the world flock to our platform. We have solid venture funding, an astonishing team who will fight beside you to accomplish the impossible, and we even offer great benefits and stock options.', 'Seasoned veteran with Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL/CentOS)', 'Work From Home Setup', 'Strong experience debugging low-level system issues', 'Wellness Programs', 'B.S. / M.S. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or related work experience10+ years of experience in a Systems Engineer or DevOps roleExperience building high-availability systems with a goal of 100% uptimeProven production usage of Amazon Web Services (AWS), Google Cloud Platform (GCP)Seasoned veteran with Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL/CentOS)Production usage of Docker, KubernetesDeep experience with ElasticsearchExpert understanding of Ansible\xa0or TerraformExperience with enterprise networking and security in the cloudFundamental understanding of computer programming (e.g. able to read/understand code, understand how code is packaged and shipped)Experience with Ruby, RailsExperience building RPM based system packagesStrong experience debugging low-level system issuesComfortable with the fast-paced and unpredictable nature of Systems EngineeringStrong desire for personal and team technical growth\xa0', 'Experience owning projects from concept to implementation and leading small teamsRuns Linux at homeActively contributes to Open Source Software Projects', "What are some of the interesting problems you'll be working on:", 'We value those that are tech curious and love to tinker and make things better.\xa0Detailed oriented minds that want to make things easier to support, faster to support and more adaptable to change at global scale. We want someone that wants a voice in the design of solutions. We want someone that values collaboration and working closely with others to learn the answers to complex and interesting technical questions.', 'About You', 'Experience building RPM based system packages', 'Runs Linux at home', 'Candidates should have an extensive experience within Systems Engineering or DevOps roles and should feel comfortable troubleshooting potentially unfamiliar issues across a variety of technologies.', 'Actively contributes to Open Source Software Projects', 'Designing, building and maintaining the systems that power the Kenna Platform.', 'Experience owning projects from concept to implementation and leading small teams', 'Retirement Planning', 'Comfortable with the fast-paced and unpredictable nature of Systems Engineering', 'Kenna Security is revolutionizing cyber risk with a SaaS-based platform that uses data science to combine vulnerability data with exploit intelligence to measure risk, predict attacks and prioritize remediation. We are leading the way in helping enterprises reduce their risk while increasing their efficiency and preventing attacks. Kenna Security was recently named one of the top 10 hottest start-ups and named to the Inc. 500 fastest growing companies list.', 'What does it take to work at Kenna?', 'Friendly & Casual Environment', 'B.S. / M.S. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or related work experience', 'Experience with Ruby, Rails', 'Bonus Points: ', 'Generous Paid Parental Leave', 'Company Equity', 'Work/Life Balance', 'Proven production usage of Amazon Web Services (AWS), Google Cloud Platform (GCP)', 'Medical, Dental, Vision & Disability Insurance', 'Employee Referral Program', 'Expert understanding of Ansible\xa0or Terraform', 'About Us', 'Designing, building and maintaining the systems that power the Kenna Platform.Enabling the transition to containers and fully immutable infrastructure.Interacting with developers and support to define and prioritize focus.Solutions that value CI/CD pipelines as a strategic must have.Building cost effective solutions by analyzing and creating opportunity for data driven decision making.Using best practice automation and documentation as an enabler for resiliency.Mentoring your peers in best practice methods.Respond to production issues on an on-call basis.', 'Fundamental understanding of computer programming (e.g. able to read/understand code, understand how code is packaged and shipped)', 'Pet Insurance', 'Solutions that value CI/CD pipelines as a strategic must have.', 'Strong desire for personal and team technical growth\xa0', 'Experience building high-availability systems with a goal of 100% uptime', 'NOTE:\xa0Kenna will not consider or accept resumes from external recruiters for this job posting. Kenna will not be responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.']

['', 'Learn the nuts and bolts of Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA) and Event-Driven Architecture (EDA) in real-life applications.', 'Cvent is an exciting, fast-growing tech company that provides industry-leading software to event professionals around the world. Our suite of services - online event registration, venue selection, mobile apps, email marketing, web surveys, and targeted hotel advertising opportunities - have positioned us as a major player in the estimated $565 billion global meetings and events industry.', 'Create beautiful, interactive, and easy-to-use web applications using rich client-side code and MVC based server-side code.', 'Need more reasons to consider us?\xa0We offer competitive salary packages, an extensive benefits package for all full-time employees, including medical, dental, vision, stock options, bonuses, 401K, gym\xa0membership discounts, and other great perks! If you would like to learn more about Cvent and our products, visit our website at www.cvent.com\xa0\xa0', 'Gain experience with different database technologies, ranging from traditional relational to the latest NoSQL products such as MongoDB and Redis.\xa0', 'Cvent offers a fun, collegial work environment tailored to sharpening your technical skills and growing as a software professional. While we have evolved from startup to mid-sized company, our Technology Team has preserved an entrepreneurial and merit-driven culture where meaningful initiative and contribution are recognized and rewarded.\xa0', 'Experience with one or more of the following databases: SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, MongoDB, Redis or other NoSQL technologies', 'Cvent’s Technology Team is a great opportunity for you to:\xa0', '2+ years of programming experience in two or more of the following: C#, Java, C++, ASP.NET, MVC, PHP, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, JQuery, Web Services and API development using REST or SOAPExperience with one or more of the following databases: SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, MongoDB, Redis or other NoSQL technologiesBS, MS or PhD in Computer Science OR related technical discipline\xa0', 'Work on Internet-scale applications, where performance, reliability, and scalability, are critical design goals –not after-thoughts.Create beautiful, interactive, and easy-to-use web applications using rich client-side code and MVC based server-side code.Create innovative mobile applications on a wide range of platforms including iOS, Android, and others.Learn the nuts and bolts of Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA) and Event-Driven Architecture (EDA) in real-life applications.Gain experience with different database technologies, ranging from traditional relational to the latest NoSQL products such as MongoDB and Redis.\xa0', 'The prerequisites for joining our development team are simple. We care more about your attitude and aptitude than the specific tools and technologies you have used in the past. You need to have a strong passion for software development and must take pride in your coding. You should also have great analytical skills and the ability to handle complex, modular software development in a collaborative team-based environment.\xa0', 'Skills/Qualifications we are seeking our Senior Software Engineers to have are:\xa0', 'Is coding as much art as it is science?', 'In addition to this, you will have a leg up if you also meet the following criteria:', '\xa0', 'If you answered yes to all the above, then you belong at Cvent!', 'BS, MS or PhD in Computer Science OR related technical discipline\xa0', 'Do you like the challenge of building great products that are feature-rich –but also easy to use? Would you like to work in a collaborative environment where sharing knowledge and ideas is not only encouraged –but expected?', '2+ years of programming experience in two or more of the following: C#, Java, C++, ASP.NET, MVC, PHP, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, JQuery, Web Services and API development using REST or SOAP', 'Work on Internet-scale applications, where performance, reliability, and scalability, are critical design goals –not after-thoughts.', 'Create innovative mobile applications on a wide range of platforms including iOS, Android, and others.', 'At Cvent we celebrate, support and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive environment. We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status or any other legally protected characteristics.', 'Cvent maintains a drug-free workplace.', 'Are you passionate about software?', 'We are looking for Software Engineers to join our rapidly growing Technology Team. Cvent’s Technology Team is responsible for the design, development, and operation of the company’s suite of cloud-based software products. We are currently engaged in a major initiative to build our next-generation software platform, utilizing the most cutting edge tools and technologies.\xa0']

least 3+ years of experience  Hands-on statistical analysis with a solid fundamental understanding  Designing experiments and collecting data  Writing code and reviewing others’ in a shared codebase, preferably in Python and Java  Practical SQL knowledge  Familiarity with the Linux command line ", "This position requires you to be located in the USThe Data Science team at Signifyd builds the models that power our fraud detection engine. Our machine learning pipeline keeps us one step ahead of fraudsters and their constantly evolving tactics and our research and experiments develop into new products that improve the merchant payments experience.We expect our data scientists to be hands-on. We carry solutions from a brainstorm to experimentation and all the way to deployment. We’re a varied group with a diversity of strengths -- some team members came to us from academic backgrounds, others from engineering, some from big companies and some from small, but all of us are curious and collaborative.We are looking for someone who embodies our company values:Curious and Hungry: Be willing to do research and design experiments by being hands-onTenacious: Creating something new is hard work, and our Data Scientist team never gives upCustomer Passion: Be the backbone to our platform, and help us stay ahead of fraudstersDesign for Scale: Work with the rest of the Data Science team to make fraud protection at scale possibleAgile: Some days you may spend doing research and designing experiments while others are spent using your analytical toolbox to surface insights into real-time fraud attacks. Roll Up Your Sleeves: Partner closely internally to learn from others, and succeed as a teamHow You’ll Have An Impact Building production machine learning models that identify fraud  Designing new algorithms that optimize all the key components of the Signifyd Commerce Protection Platform  Writing production and offline analytical code in Python and Java  Researching real-time emerging fraud patterns with the Risk Analysis team  Working with distributed data pipelines  Communicating complex ideas effectively to a variety of audiences  Collaborating with engineering teams to continuously strengthen our machine learning pipeline  Mentoring other members of the team Past Experience You’ll Need Bachelor's degree in computer science, applied mathematics, or an analytical field  An advanced degree (M.S. or Ph.D) in computer science, applied mathematics, or an analytical field is highly preferred  At least 3+ years of experience  Hands-on statistical analysis with a solid fundamental understanding  Designing experiments and collecting data  Writing code and reviewing others’ in a shared codebase, preferably in Python and Java  Practical SQL knowledge  Familiarity with the Linux command line Experience We Love To See Data analysis in a distributed environment  Passion for writing well-tested production-grade code  Using visualizations to communicate analytical results to stakeholders outside your team  Previous work in fraud, payments, or e-commerce", 'Design for Scale: ']

['', 'To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.', 'Innovative', 'Highly Technical. You are fluent in commonly used design patterns. You can constructively review the work of others to ensure high quality and adherence to best practices. You love to write maintainable and understandable quality code. You write tests for your code as a way to maintain high quality. You have demonstrated the ability to come up to speed quickly on new technologies. ', 'Passionate.
