['Essential Duties and Responsibilities', 'Candidates must also be able to perform analyses on sample and real-world business datasets to validate and quantify trends or patterns of interest to the business groups worldwide.', 'Candidates must also be able to design and construct data visualizations, i.e., interactive dashboards, for business use in Tableau.', 'This position is responsible for planning, managing and executing an array and analytics activities to provide insights and model results that benefit the consumer marketing and product development teams.\xa0This involves, in part, collecting data and constructing solutions to business problems.Candidates for this position must be able to write Python 3.7 and Google BigQuery scripts to manipulate and analyze data.Candidates must also be able to perform analyses on sample and real-world business datasets to validate and quantify trends or patterns of interest to the business groups worldwide.Candidates must also be able to design and construct data visualizations, i.e., interactive dashboards, for business use in Tableau.', 'An ideal candidate would be someone who has a track record of successfully delivering analytical projects, is passionate about working with data to find the story hidden within, demonstrates a continuous learning and growth mindset, has experience working at the intersection\xa0of consumer marketing and technology, and has an ability to communicate complex analytics concepts in non-technical terms to business leaders. The ideal candidate will also have demonstrable experience working with the variety of technologies contained within the Google Cloud Platform, as well as experience developing enterprise quality Python 3.7 code for analytics applications.', 'Candidates for this position must be able to write Python 3.7 and Google BigQuery scripts to manipulate and analyze data.', 'Education and or Experience', '\xa0', 'Summary', "Bachelor's degree or advanced degree computer science, information science, marketing analytics or other quantitative field and 3 or more years of work experience in consumer analytics, with clear examples of work performed.", 'This position is responsible for planning, managing and executing an array and analytics activities to provide insights and model results that benefit the consumer marketing and product development teams.\xa0This involves, in part, collecting data and constructing solutions to business problems.', 'At this leading global grill manufacturing and marketing company you will have the opportunity to work with a wide variety of very large datasets to drive revenue growth, improve operational processes,\xa0and affect the shopping and grilling experience for our consumers worldwide.', 'Weber is looking for an Analyst, Data Science to join our Strategic Data Analytics team. Analysts work on our centralized enterprise analytics team to analyze consumer data, develop data visualizations,\xa0and perform various advanced analytics activities.\xa0The data analytics effort is growing at Weber, and we are looking for a new team member interested in learning and collaborating to help solve consumer marketing and other business problems with data-driven solutions.']

['', 'As the third member of our software engineering team, you’ll be working day-to-day with our technical founder to uphold this passion and build the experiences that will solve these very real challenges for the market.', '🇺🇸 This position is open to US based applicants only.', "It'd be cool if you've done this.", '🏳️\u200d🌈 Kamana is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, age, national origin, religion, physical or mental handicaps or disabilities, marital status, Veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity nor any other basis that is prohibited by law or outside of the bounds of being a decent human.', 'We build user-centric, feedback-driven software for the healthcare staffing industry. Currently focused on travel nursing and allied health, we enable healthcare workers to manage their credentials and careers from a single place, and staffing agencies to hire and collaborate with the workforce far more efficiently.', "What you've done before.", "You'll be using\xa0Elixir\xa0and the\xa0Phoenix\xa0web framework as your primary development tools. You’ll expand our real-time capabilities with\xa0LiveView\xa0and help us solve technical challenges in the world of healthcare staffing.", "We offer a competitive salary and a comprehensive benefits package that spans medical, financial, and quality of life benefits. Think medical, dental, and vision insurance, a 401K with company match, a flexible schedule and paid time off policy, paid vacations, the tools you'll need to be successful, and the flexibility you'll need to put your health and family first.", 'We often work 9 to 5 but appreciate the need for flexibility and trust each other to find a schedule that fits our lives best. On occasion you’ll find us burning the midnight oil. But it’s more because we want to, not because we have to.', 'You have production experience developing and deploying Elixir applications. You have an in depth understanding of the components of Phoenix (Controllers, Channels, Contexts, Schemas, etc.). You also have a deep understanding of how Elixir (and Erlang) concepts make Phoenix possible.', 'Compensation & benefits.', 'We have big plans to capitalize on some of the\xa0advanced features of OTP\xa0in order to bring modern web application concepts to healthcare, so a strong knowledge of OTP is a definite plus. Experience building\xa0versioned APIs\xa0will help you get to the top of the list. There’s still a little JavaScript hanging around our app, so a working knowledge of JavaScript won’t hurt.', "We are a small and passionate team working to eliminate inefficiency and financial waste in the world of healthcare staffing. We're transparent. We're nimble. We're always learning. And we're having a ton of fun along the way.", 'What we do.', 'deep understanding', "You can typically find us in Virginia, Colorado, Florida, Nebraska, New York, California, or Pennsylvania. Prior to COVID-times we used to meet up on occasion for face-to-face collaboration, which we'll plan to resume at least once per year when the world allows it.", "Why we're here.", 'You consider yourself a\xa0senior-level software engineer. You are passionate about solving real problems for real people. You love delighting users by creating great product experiences. You have a growth mindset, you own your work, and you seek continuous learning in everything you do.', 'And finally, knowledge of the following would land you at the top of the list, but is in no way required: healthcare staffing or credentialing software, travel nursing, applicant tracking systems, CRMs, or other HR Technology.', 'How we work.', 'components of Phoenix', 'Elixir\xa0and the\xa0Phoenix\xa0web framework', 'production experience developing and deploying Elixir applications', "What you'll do.", 'Who you are.', 'advanced features of OTP', 'Who we are.', 'Kamana is a remote-first team. We leverage software such as Asana, Slack, and Geekbot to collaborate effectively across time zones, and work however we are the happiest and most productive.', 'Kamana was born out of the personal frustration one of our founders experienced throughout his nursing career. Having spent more than a decade working in dozens of hospitals across the country, John witnessed first-hand how repetitive processes and inefficient technology results in missed opportunities and financial waste for him and his employers.', 'Who you are', "Healthcare professionals are busy, always on the go, and fatigued from the industry norm of hard-to-use tech that rarely works from their phone. An employer's success in healthcare staffing often comes down to who can move the fastest through the hiring flow. With this in mind, we are passionate about creating user-centric, mobile-first, and hyper-fast technology.", 'senior-level software engineer']

Our culture and our products reflect that.', 'Ability to work independently in a fast-paced growing environment', 'Company Overview:', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or other relevant fields; or equivalent work experience7+ years of programming in various environments", 'Generate technical documentation', 'Docker', 'AWS Lambda or other FaaS', 'Golang', 'Developing highly available and highly scalable applications', 'Developing highly available and highly scalable applicationsCollaborate with product management, peer teams, and quality assurance, and end-users to produce cutting-edge software solutionsGenerate high-coverage unit and integrations testsGenerate technical documentationEvaluate and recommend tools and technologies to ensure the highest quality product platformShape development processes to promote a high-quality output while continuing to iterateMentor and guide the professional and technical development of team members', 'Experience with at least several of the following:', 'Experience deploying cloud-native solutions to AWS, Azure, or GCPExperience with at least several of the following:MicroservicesGolangDockerKubernetesAWS Lambda or other FaaSgRPCAWS DynamoDB or similarSQL relational databasesApache KafkaExperience developing software using version control systems (preferably Git)Ability to work independently in a fast-paced growing environment', 'We are following domain-driven design principles to build a new, greenfield technology platform to manage and serve our provider and caregiver data. If you like having autonomy, if you thrive on collaboration and building new things, and if you’re all about using your talent for good, Care.com is the place for you.', "Available in more than 20 countries, Care.com is the world's leading platform for finding and managing high-quality family care. Since 2007, families have relied on Care.com's industry-leading products—from child and elder care to pet care and home care. Care.com is an IAC company (NASDAQ: IAC).", 'Microservices']

Keep up-to-date with security patches and proactively address security vulnerabilities and compliance.Analyze a variety of approaches to the DevOps problems – provide pros and cons of different approaches to the team to arrive at an agreed upon direction.', 'Understanding of security best practices for banking procedures (ideally PCI knowledge)', 'Job Description', 'BS or MS in Computer Science, related field, or equivalent professional experience.Understanding of security best practices for banking procedures (ideally PCI knowledge)Experience in network security (DNS, VPN/VPC, IDS/IPS, Subnets/Security Groups/Network ACLs) and technologies supporting compliance (HA/DR, Identity Management, Key Management, WAF and others.', 'Identify key system metrics and ensure adequate monitoring coverage for new and existing services.', 'We are looking for a Senior DevOps engineer to build and manage the next generation of Wealth Management systems, with a focus on system stability, performance and monitoring. We are based in NYC and Raleigh, NC. ['', 'As a result of the rapid adoption of our product in the market, we’re currently looking to add a few experienced Software Engineers that have “been there and done that” within the networking, telco, 4G, 5G, and/or IoT space, to help us continue the rapid evolution of our PaaS offering. \xa0', 'Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.', '“People want what we do. They just don’t know that it’s possible.”', 'Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.', 'Why should you join our team? \xa0', 'Although we’re a fully remote team, our preference is to hire in Canada and/or the USA at this time.\xa0Our engineers are at the top of their field, we provide them with immense challenges to solve, and we compensate accordingly.', 'If you feel the above resonated with you, and you have what it takes to join our team, reach out, and apply today.', '“Everyone wants to be a hacker. It is the ones that are actually getting into that code or those APIs, creating them and writing them. That’s what developers want to get at. That’s what we do.”', 'At Expeto Wireless, we’re solving technical challenges that the networking and telco industry didn’t realize were solvable.\xa0', 'Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.', 'We asked a few of our engineers that exact question and here’s what they had to share:', 'If you’d like to be considered to join our team, here’s what we’re hoping to see in you:', 'At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).', 'Our software integrates mobile networks and IoT applications onto a single platform specifically designed for the large enterprise market and we believe that harnessing data from connected devices around the world will unlock insights that shape business strategy and help companies make better, more informed decisions to ensure a sustainable future.', 'If you want to help us work smarter and faster than the giants of the private mobile networking and telco world AND be on the cutting edge of IoT…', 'Expeto is an equal opportunity employer. Should you require accommodation in any aspect of our selection process, please contact our recruitment team at careers (at) expeto (dot) io.', '“There are not many software engineering positions where you get to do heart surgery in a sense. The big carrier networks are closed. You get walls upon walls of security around that stuff. There are very few people who actually get the keys to the kingdom. That’s our gig. We are doing that heart surgery and playing around with stuff that very few people get to do.”']

job_title: Lead Machine Learning Engineer for Satellite Applications
job_text: ['This\xa0position\xa0is\xa0based in Boulder, CO\xa0or Houston, TX,\xa0and a\xa0possible\xa0Virtual Location can\xa0be considered\xa0initially.\xa0', '401K offered and company contribution towards medical, dental, and vision.\xa0', 'US Citizenship required\xa0', 'Ability to work in a team\xa0\xa0', 'Deploying ML models to production\xa0\xa0', 'We are a startup, so be warned that there will be growing pains. However, we will make sure to work with you so that you can hit the ground running with minimal roadblocks. You can expect:\xa0\xa0', 'Analyzing different ML and RL algorithms and ranking them by their success probability\xa0\xa0', 'We Work\xa0Amongst\xa0', 'Proficiency with Windows and Linux development environments\xa0\xa0', "US Citizenship required\xa05+ years of proven professional experience as a Machine Learning Engineer, Applied Scientist, Data Scientist,\xa0or similar role\xa0\xa0BSc in Computer Science, Mathematics, or similar field;\xa0Master's\xa0degree or\xa0Ph.D.\xa0is a plus\xa0\xa0Proficiency with a deep learning and reinforcement learning framework, such as\xa0mlpack, TensorFlow,\xa0or\xa0Keras\xa0\xa0Comprehensive knowledge\xa0of\xa0math, probability, statistics, and deep learning principles to extend existing ML libraries and frameworks\xa0\xa0Proficiency with Python and ML libraries such as\xa0Numpy,\xa0SciKit-learn,\xa0and Pandas\xa0\xa0Proficiency in\xa0Jupyter\xa0Notebook or similar for data exploration and visualization\xa0\xa0Proficiency with Windows and Linux development environments\xa0\xa0Ability to select hardware to run an ML model with the required latency\xa0\xa0Familiarity with C++ and object-oriented design\xa0\xa0Excellent communication skills\xa0\xa0Ability to work in a team\xa0\xa0Outstanding analytical and problem-solving skills\xa0\xa0", 'Familiarity with C++ and object-oriented design\xa0\xa0', 'Exploring and visualizing data, feature engineering\xa0', 'Seek excellence, be engaged, and be deliberate. These values guide us and enable us to be at the forefront of this fast-moving market.\xa0\xa0', 'Proficiency with Python and ML libraries such as\xa0Numpy,\xa0SciKit-learn,\xa0and Pandas\xa0\xa0', 'Training models and tuning their hyperparameters\xa0', 'Analyzing the errors of ML models and designing strategies to overcome them\xa0\xa0', 'Understanding business objectives and designing models that help to achieve them, along with metrics to track their progress\xa0\xa0', "You are an expert in machine learning (ML) and interested in building intelligent space systems to modernize\xa0satellites'\xa0operation. You will be our lead ML engineer and perform data collection, cleaning, and preprocessing, as well as training models and deploying them to production. You are passionate about reinforcement learning (RL) and artificial intelligence (AI) and stay updated with the\xa0field's\xa0latest developments.\xa0\xa0", 'Growing and leading a team of data scientists and ML engineers\xa0', "BSc in Computer Science, Mathematics, or similar field;\xa0Master's\xa0degree or\xa0Ph.D.\xa0is a plus\xa0\xa0", 'Support data generation and acquisition process\xa0\xa0', 'Developing ML and RL algorithms to solve unique problems\xa0\xa0', 'What We Can Offer\xa0', "The number of satellites is expected to grow by 20\xa0times\xa0during\xa0the\xa0next\xa0ten\xa0years. Just as the telephone required automation a hundred years ago when demand exploded, we\xa0won't\xa0be able to operate satellites the same way we do today. And so, our mission is to apply the latest in machine learning technology to orchestrate the evolution of space.\xa0\xa0", "What\xa0You'll\xa0Do\xa0", 'Managing hardware resources for ML training and production\xa0', 'Every new member we bring on is crucial to our business. We are building a team of all-stars, from exceptional aerospace engineers to cloud computing architects to machine learning and data science wizards. We recruit teammates that set very high standards for themselves and are quick to offer innovative ideas.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Our Team\xa0', 'Outstanding analytical and problem-solving skills\xa0\xa0', '\xa0', '5+ years of proven professional experience as a Machine Learning Engineer, Applied Scientist, Data Scientist,\xa0or similar role\xa0\xa0', 'Requirements\xa0to be considered\xa0', 'Understanding business objectives and designing models that help to achieve them, along with metrics to track their progress\xa0\xa0Developing ML and RL algorithms to solve unique problems\xa0\xa0Analyzing different ML and RL algorithms and ranking them by their success probability\xa0\xa0Training models and tuning their hyperparameters\xa0Developing new ML methodologies and techniques\xa0Deploying ML models to production\xa0\xa0Managing hardware resources for ML training and production\xa0Growing and leading a team of data scientists and ML engineers\xa0Analyzing the errors of ML models and designing strategies to overcome them\xa0\xa0Exploring and visualizing data, feature engineering\xa0Support and manage data pipelines for ML training\xa0Support data generation and acquisition process\xa0\xa0', 'We Work\xa0Amongst\xa0\xa0', 'Our Values', 'Support and manage data pipelines for ML training\xa0', 'Excellent communication skills\xa0\xa0', 'Competitive compensation based on qualifications and experience.\xa0Unlimited vacation days, and company holidays\xa0401K offered and company contribution towards medical, dental, and vision.\xa0', 'Where We Work\xa0', 'Competitive compensation based on qualifications and experience.\xa0', 'Where You Come In\xa0', 'Proficiency with a deep learning and reinforcement learning framework, such as\xa0mlpack, TensorFlow,\xa0or\xa0Keras\xa0\xa0', 'Unlimited vacation days, and company holidays\xa0', 'Where You Come In', 'Our Values\xa0', 'Proficiency in\xa0Jupyter\xa0Notebook or similar for data exploration and visualization\xa0\xa0', 'Cognitive Space\xa0Mission\xa0', 'Developing new ML methodologies and techniques\xa0', 'Ability to select hardware to run an ML model with the required latency\xa0\xa0', 'Comprehensive knowledge\xa0of\xa0math, probability, statistics, and deep learning principles to extend existing ML libraries and frameworks\xa0\xa0', 'We\xa0offer\xa0our product to satellite operators and work closely with other\xa0aerospace industry partners\xa0to reach our vision of intelligent space machines. We work with the government (DoD and\xa0Civil) and the commercial\xa0sector.\xa0\xa0']

['', ' Provides the installation, maintenance, support, and enhancements to the organization’s infrastructure.', ' MCSA (Microsoft Certified Systems Associate)', ' Communicates Hoag IT standards to project team and vendors.', ' Meets or exceeds departmental service level metrics and provides feedback to improve service levels. ', ' ITIL certification', ' Experience with anti-virus software', ' Associates degree in computer science or related IT field, plus five years experience in IT operations, or seven years experience in IT operations', ' Evaluates new equipment, operating system upgrades and patches.', ' Experience with EPIC', ' Works independently to make those day-to-day decisions in the management of the Hoag Enterprise Infrastructure server environment Serves as the subject matter expert for all Enterprise Infrastructure server knowledge and support Provides the installation, maintenance, support, and enhancements to the organization’s infrastructure. Performs evaluation, design, installation, configuration, upgrades, testing, documentation, and expansion for desktop, laptop, management, and operating technologies. Supports the functions which contribute to the continued operation of the Hoag’s IT department. Participates in projects to ensure the successful implementation and operation of Windows-based systems. Communicates Hoag IT standards to project team and vendors. Responsible for working with other system engineers to maintain and enhance existing Local Area Network/Wide Area Network (LAN/WAN) infrastructure. Participates in strategic initiatives while performing technical project activities. Assists, where possible, in streamlining daily operations. Monitors system performance, diagnoses system issues, and performs emergency and scheduled maintenance to maximize system availability and reliability. Responds to, resolves and follows up on reported issues through the trouble ticketing system within an ITIL environment using departmental processes. Coordinates with user community and vendors scheduling times and user procedures necessary for operating system upgrades and/or maintenance. Supports password maintenance, new user logon and setup, file access permissions, and data protection procedures. Ensures environment and components within are managed with high emphasis on information security; protecting the organization from threats and data loss prevention. Proposes and implements system enhancements. Develops and maintains operational documentation. Provides guidance and support to System Administrators, Service Desk Personnel, and Desktop support teams. Prepares monthly status reports, quantitatively reporting system performance and uptime. Works with Senior Enterprise Infrastructure Engineer to design and implement complex enterprise solutions. Adheres to organization, IT, and change/release management policy and procedures, and service level agreements. Updates skills as changes occur in the hardware/software infrastructure. Position may require travel between various Hoag locations and its affiliates. Position may require participation in 24/7 department on-call program. On-call employees are required to carry a department issued cellular phone or pager, respond to calls within 15 minutes, troubleshoot problem and provide services off-site as needed and be available to provide services on-site as needed within 1½ hours of being called or paged to respond. Position may require participating in meetings outside of normal business hours including occasional evenings and/or weekends. The Position is in a support department which operates a call center 24 hours a day, seven days a week to provide support and service. Operations include 1st, 2nd and 3rd shifts. Employees may be required to pick up shifts outside of their standard assignment for coverage due to vacations, holidays, staff shortages, or other special circumstances as determined by leadership. Enterprise Infrastructure Engineer Senior: In addition to the above, the Enterprise Infrastructure Engineer Senior will: Performs as technical lead on projects. Evaluates new equipment, operating system upgrades and patches. Responsible for securing system resources. Designs, implements and tests new applications and equipment for the Windows-based system infrastructure. Prepares system build documentation and audits server builds. Assists with vendor management. Develops and maintains policies, procedures and standards specific to server activities. Identifies opportunities to automate procedures, increase efficiencies, and eliminate recurring problems. Meets or exceeds departmental service level metrics and provides feedback to improve service levels.  Performs all job-related responsibilities with minimal management direction and guidance. Develops and implements department specific performance and service standards and training certifications. Develops and performs training related to system operational monitoring and initial trouble analysis. Mentors others within the group. Provides regular updates to management. Provides input to EA strategy. The intent of your job description is to provide you, the IT team members in general, and Hoag leadership a core understanding of the requirements of your position and it is not intended to be an inclusive list of responsibilities. In addition to the listed core requirements and responsibilities, each employee is individually responsible for proactively taking appropriate actions to assure the best possible outcomes for Hoag and its affiliates.RequiredEducation, Training and ExperienceEnterprise Infrastructure Engineer Minimum one (1) work experience as Enterprise Infrastructure administrator or equivalent MCSA (Microsoft Certified Systems Associate) Associate degree in related technical field or equivalent experience Expertise in Windows 2012/2016/2019 Operating Systems & Active Directory Experience with Microsoft applications, i.e.: O365, IIS and Terminal Services Experience with Help desk software Experience with anti-virus software Experience with system monitoring software Experience with backup software and recovery procedures Experience with HP and Cisco servers Experience with RAID configurations Experience with VMWare ESX and VDI platforms Experience with Citrix Xenapp/Xendesktop Server platform Enterprise Infrastructure Engineer Senior: In addition to the above, the Windows Engineer Senior will have: Seven years minimum experience in systems administration or technical support, including at least five years experience as a mid-range administrator in a multi-server environment MCSE (Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer) -- Windows 2012/2016/2019 Server Associates degree in computer Enterprise Infrastructure Engineer Senior: In addition to the above, the Enterprise Infrastructure Engineer Senior will:', ' Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or other related field, or equivalent work experience.', ' Adheres to organization, IT, and change/release management policy and procedures, and service level agreements.', ' Associate degree in related technical field or equivalent experience', 'Required', ' Seven years minimum experience in systems administration or technical support, including at least five years experience as a mid-range administrator in a multi-server environment', 'Skills or Other Qualifications:', ' Prepares monthly status reports, quantitatively reporting system performance and uptime.', ' Knowledge of DNS, DHCP, WINS, and TCP/IP', ' Experience with Microsoft clustering', ' Provides regular updates to management.', ' Experience with VMware Realize Ops Manager', 'Education, Training and Experience', ' Experience with Citrix Xenapp/Xendesktop Server platform Enterprise Infrastructure Engineer Senior: In addition to the above, the Windows Engineer Senior will have:', ' Assists with vendor management.', ' Mentors others within the group.', ' Prepares system build documentation and audits server builds.', ' Performs all job-related responsibilities with minimal management direction and guidance.', ' Experience in multi-domain, WAN environments, Azure', ' Experience with Microsoft applications, i.e., Office365, SQL 2008/2012/2016, and SCCM', ' Designs, implements and tests new applications and equipment for the Windows-based system infrastructure.', ' Demonstrated ability to use problem solving techniques such as root cause analysis to resolve issues', ' Provides input to EA strategy. The intent of your job description is to provide you, the IT team members in general, and Hoag leadership a core understanding of the requirements of your position and it is not intended to be an inclusive list of responsibilities. In addition to the listed core requirements and responsibilities, each employee is individually responsible for proactively taking appropriate actions to assure the best possible outcomes for Hoag and its affiliates.', ' Supports the functions which contribute to the continued operation of the Hoag’s IT department.', 'Preferred', ' Experience with system monitoring software', ' Develops and performs training related to system operational monitoring and initial trouble analysis.', ' Performs evaluation, design, installation, configuration, upgrades, testing, documentation, and expansion for desktop, laptop, management, and operating technologies.', ' Proposes and implements system enhancements.', ' Experience with SAN technologies, including SCSI, Fiber Channel, HBAs, storage zoning, volume management, replication, and storage consolidation', ' Experience with HP and Cisco servers', ' Identifies opportunities to automate procedures, increase efficiencies, and eliminate recurring problems.', ' Experience with ServiceNow application', ' Participates in strategic initiatives while performing technical project activities.', ' Ensures environment and components within are managed with high emphasis on information security; On-call employees are required to carry a department issued cellular phone or pager, respond to calls within 15 minutes, troubleshoot problem and provide services off-site as needed and be available to provide services on-site as needed within 1½ hours of being called or paged to respond.', ' Position may require travel between various Hoag locations and its affiliates.', ' Works independently to make those day-to-day decisions in the management of the Hoag Enterprise Infrastructure server environment', ' Provides guidance and support to System Administrators, Service Desk Personnel, and Desktop support teams.', ' Experience with VMware ESX VM provisioning', ' Serves as the subject matter expert for all Enterprise Infrastructure server knowledge and support', ' Responsible for working with other system engineers to maintain and enhance existing Local Area Network/Wide Area Network (LAN/WAN) infrastructure.', ' Excellent communication skills; customer focused; excellent attention to detail; able to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines; strong interpersonal skills; able to work in a team environment.', 'Essential Functions Enterprise Infrastructure Engineer', ' Current CA driver’s license required for local travel. job_title: Software Engineer I (C++ application code development and Linux/Unix)
job_text: ['', 'Job Summary:', 'Job Description :', 'Strong problem solving ability', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, Software Engineering, or related STEM field.', 'Required:', '• Help improve code quality by supporting software integration, verification and performing code reviews.', 'U.S. Citizenship status is required as this position needs an active U.S. Security Clearance within one year of employment. This position can be filled at Marlborough MA or Tewksbury MA', '• Work in a team environment with the product and design teams to understand end-user requirements, formulate use cases, and then translate that into a pragmatic and effective technical solution.', 'Experience with C++ application code development and Linux/Unix', 'Radar domain knowledge', "Master's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, or Software Engineering", "Radar domain knowledgeSoftware development experience in a DoD environmentBroad real-time, multi-threaded software development experienceStrong Object-Oriented Design Knowledge including UMLExperience in Agile development methods, including Scrum, automated testing and continuous integration\xa0Familiarity with the following Software Tools: Rational Rhapsody, ClearCase,\xa0\xa0Rational Team Concert, Jenkins, DOORS, Google TestStrong problem solving abilityActive Secret ClearanceMaster's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, or Software Engineering", 'Experience in Agile development methods, including Scrum, automated testing and continuous integration', '• Develop robust and scalable software in C++ running Linux or UNIX operating systems on a variety of computing platforms using Agile development methods.', '172519BR - Sr Software Engineer I', 'Broad real-time, multi-threaded software development experience', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, Software Engineering, or related STEM field.4 plus years’ experience in Software Engineering to include:Experience with C++ application code development and Linux/UnixExperience developing software in a team based development environmentSelf-starter and ability to lead development, integration and test activitiesUS Citizenship is required', '• Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute ideas to our technology, algorithms and products.', '• Design, implement, debug and problem solve Radar Software Applications while providing feedback to other team members.', '\xa0', 'US Citizenship is required', 'Software development experience in a DoD environment', 'Strong Object-Oriented Design Knowledge including UML', 'Experience developing software in a team based development environment', 'Self-starter and ability to lead development, integration and test activities', '• Dive into difficult problems and successfully deliver results on schedule along with other duties as assigned.', 'We are looking for a Senior C++ Software Developer to join our Radar Software Product Line.\xa0Your mission will be to provide world class Radar Software to be used in military systems deployed at sea and on land. As a member of the Radar Software Product Line team, you will provide impact to programs across the company’s portfolio. Our software teams employ an Agile software development methodology to rapidly design, code, integrate and test capabilities on a continuous basis into a mature solution for our customers. We strive for technical excellence by drawing upon a diverse workforce whose knowledge base covers the complete spectrum of modern computing languages and platforms.', 'Desired:\xa0', '\xa0Familiarity with the following Software Tools: Rational Rhapsody, ClearCase,\xa0\xa0Rational Team Concert, Jenkins, DOORS, Google Test', '4 plus years’ experience in Software Engineering to include:', 'Active Secret Clearance']

['', 'Check out the code: github.com/fluencelabs/', 'experience with Substrate, Tendermint, or other implementations', 'Commitment:', 'Commitment:\xa0Full-time', 'experience with Rust', 'basic understanding of cryptographic algorithms', 'an interest in decentralized technology and Web 3', 'experience in building and deploying complex distributed systems using cloud stack', 'Location:', 'And why we are building Fluence: youtube.com/watch?v=sKhaP0c4ldI', 'hands-on experience with cryptographic primitives, public key infrastructure, data and privacy protection techniques', 'hands-on experience with distributed consensus protocols, Byzantine fault tolerance (BFT), blockchain consensus (PoS/PoW/etc)', 'background in cryptography, networking, or academia', 'Role:', 'We are looking for an experienced engineer for building the blockchain component of the Fluence project. The blockchain is used as a global, decentralized software licensing engine, that keeps track of all software usage and facilitates payments. As an expert in distributed systems, you will lead the development of the Fluence blockchain and the integration with the Fluence computing node.', 'Location:\xa0Remote', 'We would like to speak to people who are empathetic, humble, passionate about their work, and strive for excellence. We expect that candidates are experts in their field, keep up to date with recent developments, and are excellent communicators, both in oral and written form.', '5+ years in a software engineer role', 'About Fluence Labs', 'Terms:', 'Nice to have:', 'Location:\xa0RemoteCommitment:\xa0Full-time', 'Our primary project is Fluence, an open application platform, where apps can build on each other, share data and users. Fluence is powered by a decentralized computing protocol that enables applications to evolve quickly with composability and monetize by licensing even low-level components. Fluence serves as an open runtime for internet applications; the new alternative to proprietary platforms, and APIs.', 'At Fluence Labs, we are working on new decentralized network protocols to make the internet more open and secure. We believe that open source and open protocols enable better technology for the future of humanity.', '5+ years in a software engineer roleexperience in building and deploying complex distributed systems using cloud stackhands-on experience with distributed consensus protocols, Byzantine fault tolerance (BFT), blockchain consensus (PoS/PoW/etc)basic understanding of cryptographic algorithmshands-on experience with cryptographic primitives, public key infrastructure, data and privacy protection techniquesan interest in decentralized technology and Web 3', 'Requirements:', 'Fluence Labs is a distributed team of engineers residing in New York, Moscow, Amsterdam, Helsinki, and Krasnodar. Our culture is remote-first, self-managed, and we value transparent decision making and an open source ethos.', 'experience with Substrate, Tendermint, or other implementationsbackground in cryptography, networking, or academiaexperience with Rust', 'We expect:']

['Achievement Bonuses ', 'Employee Stock Option Plan ', 'Responsibilities ', 'Enjoy thinking about how people interact with products and building experiences that users love ', 'Compensation / Benefits', "Bachelor's or Master’s Degree in Computer Science ", 'Minimum Qualifications', "70% of working Americans are living paycheck to paycheck. 60% don’t have $400 in emergency savings. Unemployment is higher than it's been for half a century. Come build cool technology that closes the wealth gap, unlocks opportunity, and empowers all Americans to achieve equality. ", 'A little about our team: we’re a multi-disciplinary product team with experts in frontend, backend, product, and design. We’ve built out an AngularJS based frontend, have continuous integration with multiple weekly deploys. We value positive energy, continuous learning and... clear communication and are committed to building an inclusive environment for people from every background. ', 'Signing bonus ', 'Required ', 'Online self-guided code challenge ', "5+ years of building websites 3+ years full-time MEAN Stack Development work (MongoDB, Express.js, AngularJS, Node.js) Bachelor's or Master’s Degree in Computer Science ", 'Approach problems with positive energy ', 'Adding new full-stack features to the Recoup.com product ', '4 weeks minimum paid vacation ', 'Highest standard for code reusability and cleanliness ', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience with JavaScript (AngularJS, MongoDB, Node.js) , HTML, CSS ', 'Quick phone pre-interview to verify responsibilities\xa0 ', 'Adding new full-stack features to the Recoup.com product Quality Assurance of your work Willingness and ability to work remotely with little oversight ', 'Bachelors, Masters, or PhD in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics or a related field ', "We're 100% remote. You can work from anywhere in the world. We're early, so you'll have an opportunity to shape not just our product, but the company itself: who we work with, and how we work together. ", 'Through our apps and services, Recoup is building a different kind of company. Recoup monitors your spending and helps claw back outrageous fees, overspend, unclaimed customer loyalty rewards and automates passive income to help you grow your net worth. ', 'Obsessed with insane user experiences and pixel-perfect user interface design Demonstrated ability to understand complex software systems with millions of lines of code and thousands of modules/classes Highest standard for code reusability and cleanliness Bachelors, Masters, or PhD in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics or a related field Enjoy thinking about how people interact with products and building experiences that users love Self-motivated and committed to personal growth Experience with JavaScript (AngularJS, MongoDB, Node.js) , HTML, CSS Approach problems with positive energy ', 'Extremely competitive and generous base salary ', 'Quality Assurance of your work ', 'Our Hiring Process ', 'Extremely competitive and generous base salary Signing bonus Achievement Bonuses Employee Stock Option Plan 4 weeks minimum paid vacation 100% remote work ', 'Required', 'Quick phone pre-interview to verify responsibilities\xa0 Online self-guided code challenge Screenshare code challenge with CTO', 'Willingness and ability to work remotely with little oversight ', 'Demonstrated ability to understand complex software systems with millions of lines of code and thousands of modules/classes ', 'Minimum Qualifications ', 'You’ll have the opportunity to own features that help users manage their finances, add new streams of passive income, and help Recoup expand features to make prosperity accessible to everyday Americans. If you’re excited by the problem spaces of designing and delivering engaging user experiences and disrupting the financial ecosystem, we want to talk to you! ', 'Our Hiring Process', '100% remote work ', 'Self-motivated and committed to personal growth ', 'Recoup is building the self-driving wallet. Join us! ', 'Screenshare code challenge with CTO', 'Obsessed with insane user experiences and pixel-perfect user interface design ', 'Compensation / Benefits ', '3+ years full-time MEAN Stack Development work (MongoDB, Express.js, AngularJS, Node.js) ', '\xa0 ', ' ', '5+ years of building websites ', "Whether we're creating new products or helping a partner app integrate Recoup for their audience, people at Recoup are builders at heart. Our team is constantly iterating, solving problems, and working together to empower people to finally have more money than they need. Together, we can help people build financially stronger communities - we're just getting started. "]

We use Kubernetes as the foundation of WCNP and build&develop Walmart ecosystem integrations on top. Besides having a quickly growing WCNP footprint in US-based businesses, we’re rapidly expanding internationally as well - so our platform adoption is happening on an unprecedented scale. Containers team is strategically located across multiple US locations in California, Arkansas, New Jersey and also internationally in India and Dublin, Ireland.', 'You are:', "We'd love to see:", 'The candidate must have working knowledge in a container and cloud-native technologies (Kubernetes, Docker, other).', 'Leads and directs in large-scale, complex, cross-functional projects', 'The candidate must have advanced working knowledge in one of the following languages: Go (preferred), Java (preferred), or other modern programming languages.', 'Eager to work on the line between Software Engineering and Systems Engineering', "This candidate will develop and support Walmart's massive Kubernetes platform across public, private, and edge computing environments.Builds tooling to help 5,000+ Walmart engineers take code from commit to production safely and quicklyBuilds tooling to help Walmart engineers unlock the power of cloud-native technologies and techniques (autoscaling, canary deployments, service mesh and more)Directs root cause analysis of critical business and production issuesLeads and directs in large-scale, complex, cross-functional projectsLeads the discovery phase of large projects to develop high-level designPromotes and supports company policies, procedures, mission, values, and standards of ethics and integrity", 'Containerization experience especially Docker and Kubernetes', 'Builds tooling to help 5,000+ Walmart engineers take code from commit to production safely and quickly', "A natural leader who takes ownership of the team's deliverables"]

['', 'You’ll get a better night sleep every night; all full-time employees receive the Pod', 'Partner with designers, product managers, and engineers to build the first-ever sleep fitness solution\xa0', "That's why Eight Sleep is looking for a talented Sr. Software Engineer, Mobile to help bring to life a beautiful mobile software experience to compliment the hardware experience. We are looking for someone with a high bar for product quality, and a passion for health tech and wellness.  Specifically, we're creating in-app digital services for sleep improvement and a subscription model around them.\xa0", 'Why you’ll love Eight\xa0', 'Strong knowledge of both Apple HIG and Android UI design principles, patterns and best practices\xa0', "We've just launched our temperature-regulated smart bed, the Pod. It's an absolute game changer, improving people's health and happiness by changing the way they sleep. At Eight Sleep we design products at the forefront of sleep innovation. Our mission is to make people’s sleep count for more, using innovative technology, detailed design, and proven science and data to personalize and improve each night for everybody—changing the way people sleep forever and for better. Backed by leading Silicon Valley investors including Khosla Ventures and Y Combinator, it was named by Fast Company in 2018 as one of the Most Innovative Companies in Consumer Electronics.', 'At Eight Sleep we continually celebrate the diverse community different individuals cultivate. As an equal opportunity employer, we stay true to our values by ensuring everyone feels they can flourish and grow. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status.', '5+ years of SW experience, with strong CS fundamentals and Engineering best practices\xa03+ years of mobile app experience in iOS and Android development, building apps for productsExperience in React Native and / or TypescriptStrong experience in maintaining your own code while working with apps\xa0Strong knowledge of both Apple HIG and Android UI design principles, patterns and best practices\xa0Experience integrating with multiple 3rd party APIs\xa0Experience working with continuous integration\xa0Data visualization experience', 'Experience in React Native and / or Typescript', '\xa0', "How you'll contribute", 'We’re a tight-knit, passionate team that’s working to improve people’s lives by improving the way they sleepLeadership is committed to employees’ wellness and career developmentYou’ll get a better night sleep every night; all full-time employees receive the PodFlexible, generous PTO\xa0100% employer contribution for medical/dental/vision insurance', 'Experience integrating with multiple 3rd party APIs\xa0', 'Experience working with continuous integration\xa0', 'We’re a tight-knit, passionate team that’s working to improve people’s lives by improving the way they sleep']

["Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering or relevant field required.", 'Description:', '- Strong knowledge of the full software development lifecycle: from business/systems analysis, through requirements gathering and functional specification authoring, to development, testing and delivery.', '- Mentoring skills necessary to provide support and constructive performance feedback.', 'This role involves building software for prototypes interfacing from a host PC to custom hardware. The main function of a software engineer in this role is to apply the principles of computer science and mathematical analysis to the design, development, testing, and evaluation of software enabling our customers to meet their goals. An engineer in this role will work with customers to gather requirements, architect, design, implement, and test their solution. A complete solution may require working within a multi-disciplinary team and providing guidance to other team members. ', '- Architect, design, implement, and test software enabling customers to meet their goals.', '- Strong knowledge of C++/C', 'Skills', 'Location: Redmond, WA', "- Strong ability to work independently and manage one's time.", 'Duration:12 months', '- Work with Electrical, Firmware, and high-level Software engineers to define solutions.', '- Gather requirements from customers and break into tasks for execution.', 'Software Engineer IV', 'As an equal opportunity employer, ICONMA prides itself on creating an employment environment that supports and encourages the abilities of all persons regardless of race, color, gender, age, sexual orientation, citizenship, or disability\xa0\xa0 \xa0', 'Education/Experience:', '- Verbal and written communication skills, problem solving skills, customer service and interpersonal skills.', '- Create unit-tests to ensure software is always meeting quality needs.', '- Strong ability to troubleshoot issues and make system changes as needed to resolve issue.', ':', 'Job Responsibilities:', '- Knowledge of Python', '- Experience with prototype HW including FPGAs']

Military forces in more than 50 countries look to us for a high-quality product portfolio that includes missiles, smart munitions, projectiles, kinetic kill vehicles and directed energy weapons. We value a diverse company with different perspectives and styles of tackling the world’s most complex challenges and toughest threats. Raytheon Technologies offers employee benefits such as a 9/80 work schedule with every other Friday off, 401(k) – Savings & Investment Plans, Paid Time Off, and Parental Leave.', 'Raytheon Missiles and Defense (RMD) in Tucson, AZ is seeking a Real Time Embedded Software Engineer to join our team.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Education/Experience using embedded Real Time Operating Systems (RTOSs) (e.g. Green Hills Integrity, Wind River VxWorks, etc)']

job_title: DATA ENGINEER III, AWS DATA PLATFORM
job_text: ['', ' Authoritative in ETL optimization, designing, coding, and tuning big data processes using Apache Spark or similar technologies. Experience with building data pipelines and applications to stream and process datasets at low latencies. Demonstrate efficiency in handling data - tracking data lineage, ensuring data quality, and improving discoverability of data. Sound knowledge of distributed systems and data architecture (lambda)- design and implement batch and stream data processing pipelines, knows how to optimize the distribution, partitioning, and MPP of high-level data structures. Knowledge of Engineering and Operational Excellence using standard methodologies.', ' Authoritative in ETL optimization, designing, coding, and tuning big data processes using Apache Spark or similar technologies.', ' Experience with Big Data technologies such as Hive/Spark.', ' Demonstrate efficiency in handling data - tracking data lineage, ensuring data quality, and improving discoverability of data.', ' Experience operating very large data warehouses or data lakes.', ' Sound knowledge of distributed systems and data architecture (lambda)- design and implement batch and stream data processing pipelines, knows how to optimize the distribution, partitioning, and MPP of high-level data structures.', 'Basic Qualifications', ' 5+ years of work experience with ETL, Data Modeling, and Data Architecture.', 'Company', ' A real passion for technology. We are looking for someone who is keen to demonstrate their existing skills while trying new approaches.', ' Proven interpersonal skills and standout colleague.', 'Description', ' Knowledge of Engineering and Operational Excellence using standard methodologies.', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Proficiency in one of the scripting languages - python, ruby, java or similar.', ' Experience with building data pipelines and applications to stream and process datasets at low latencies.', ' 5+ years of work experience with ETL, Data Modeling, and Data Architecture. Expert-level skills in writing and optimizing SQL. Experience with Big Data technologies such as Hive/Spark. Proficiency in one of the scripting languages - python, ruby, java or similar. Experience operating very large data warehouses or data lakes. Proven interpersonal skills and standout colleague. A real passion for technology. We are looking for someone who is keen to demonstrate their existing skills while trying new approaches.', ' Expert-level skills in writing and optimizing SQL.']

We were founded by a scrappy group of visionaries who were by no means “car experts” - so we don’t expect you to be one, either! We’ll take the open-minded go-getter over the pure subject matter expert any day. In that spirit, we also care about building a diverse and inclusive workplace and company. To put it simply, cars are meant for everyone, so we believe our company should be, too. We never discriminate against any candidate on the basis of gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, race, ethnicity, religion, color, national origin, marital status, veteran status or disability status. We welcome and encourage people of all backgrounds and walks of life to apply, even if you’re unsure if you meet all the requirements. (Even if this particular role isn’t the right fit, chances are we will have the right one soon!)', 'Professional Experience supporting Machine Learning applications including development and deployment in the cloud.', 'The Sr. Software Engineer, Data Infrastructure reports to the Director of Technical Operations and is an experienced and knowledgeable engineer who will help to formalize a Data Engineering team at Shift. They and Data Engineering will work closely with Infrastructure Engineering to establish architectures and processes that serve all of Shift’s supply of data to stakeholders throughout the business.', 'Familiarity and/or Experience with Infrastructure-as-Code and Configuration-as-Code (Terraform/CloudFormation/etc and Puppet/Chef/etc)', 'Experience using agile methodologies to plan and track project work.', 'Why apply?', 'Professional Experience tuning PostgreSQL Databases for performance and scalability.', '3+ years of experience with modern Software Development practices, including automated build, tests and deployment.', 'Nice To Have', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans status or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'Have experience deploying and managing data streaming pipelines based on messaging systems such as Kafka or AWS Kinesis.', 'Have built and maintained the architecture supporting data pipelines at your workplace.', '2+ years of experience utilizing Cloud-based Data Warehouses such as AWS RedShift or Google BigQuery.']

job_text: ['', " Minimum 3 years experience developing Windows applications and libraries.  Minimum 1 year experience in C# development required w/ WPF or UWP experience a plus.  Understanding of real-time networking is a plus.  Bachelor's (or higher) degree in Computer Science (or equivalent) is desired.  Experience in the construction domain is a strong positive.  Proficiency with source control systems (preferably Git) and issue-tracking systems (Jira a plus). ", ' Working with the project team using agile processes to identify/clarify project goals, establish useful milestones, and develop a breakdown of the engineering tasks to be performed. ', ' Proficiency with source control systems (preferably Git) and issue-tracking systems (Jira a plus). ', ' Demonstrating a set of fundamental software engineering skills that result in predictability in engineering, scheduling and the quality of products developed. ', ' Integrating Boston Dynamics SPOT robot into Trimble applications. ['', 'Scoping out complexity of future work ', 'At least 5 years development experience building SaaS or cloud-based commercial software products', 'Values the difference between good code and correct code, and cares about test-driven development without dogma', 'Wellframe was founded to counter a pressing industry problem: the healthcare system has struggled to find ways to support people in between care settings, at scale. We believe health plans are in the best position to advocate for their members as they navigate their health and care, but know that technology alone can’t help us achieve this ambition. That’s why our team of physicians, clinicians, public health experts, data scientists, engineers, and healthcare industry experts ensure our patented technology works in service of the person-to-person connections that make healthcare work best.', 'Areas of Responsibility:\xa0', 'A B.S. or M.S. degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a closely related field of study', 'Experienced with API integration with external services', 'Role Overview', 'Writing automated tests to ensure code is of the highest quality', 'Experience of using Java and Javascript', 'Working closely with product managers and scrum masters to understand the business problemsCollaborating with designers to ensure we deliver the optimal user experienceValidating design approach with other senior engineersWriting automated tests to ensure code is of the highest quality', 'A B.S. or M.S. degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a closely related field of studyAt least 5 years development experience building SaaS or cloud-based commercial software productsExperience of using Java and JavascriptExperienced with backend frameworks such as Spring BootExperienced with API integration with external servicesProficient with a modern scripting language such as PythonMakes good trade-offs for core design and API decisions — knows when to stick to convention, but also when to break itExcellent communicator, comfortable explaining technical problems and plans in person and in writingValues the difference between good code and correct code, and cares about test-driven development without dogmaDemonstrable history of technical mentorshipThrives on diverse technical challenges — our system integrates a wide variety of healthcare and other technologies', 'This posting is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee and any percentages listed are approximate. Duties, responsibilities and activities may change or new ones may be assigned at any time with or without notice.', 'Role Overview\xa0', 'Working closely with software engineers to guide their technical and career growth', 'Participating in on-call rotations to make sure our systems have exemplar uptime and reliabilityWorking with our customer support team to debug and fix bugs affecting our users', 'Mentoring Software Engineers ', 'Demonstrable history of technical mentorship', 'Working with our customer support team to debug and fix bugs affecting our users', 'With a focus on microservices design and UX integration, our ideal candidate will have expertise with Java, and experience with Spring Boot, with a good understanding of Javascript (ideally React) and UX design.', 'Debugging and fixing production issues\xa0', '\xa0', 'At Wellframe, we reimagine healthcare relationships through a new approach that uses high-tech to deliver the high-touch support people need, when and where they need it. We call it Digital Health Management. Our comprehensive suite of Digital Health Management solutions for care management, advocacy, and navigation help organizations forge more meaningful connections with members, across their healthcare journey.\xa0', 'Thrives on diverse technical challenges — our system integrates a wide variety of healthcare and other technologies', 'Proficient with a modern scripting language such as Python', 'Makes good trade-offs for core design and API decisions — knows when to stick to convention, but also when to break it', 'Participating in on-call rotations to make sure our systems have exemplar uptime and reliability', 'Collaborating with designers to ensure we deliver the optimal user experience', 'Validating design approach with other senior engineers', 'Experienced with backend frameworks such as Spring Boot', 'Working with product managers and scrum masters to develop proof of concepts and estimates for future work', 'Excellent communicator, comfortable explaining technical problems and plans in person and in writing', 'We are looking for a talented Senior Java Engineer to join our team to help us build the software that powers our digital care management platform dashboards, and to drive mentoring and the development of junior engineers on the team.', 'Experience & Skills ', 'Working closely with product managers and scrum masters to understand the business problems', 'Translating user stories into software solutions\xa0', '\ufeffWellframe, Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by local, state, or federal laws, rules, or regulations.']

['WHAT WE DO', 'Vital offers a dynamic workplace, competitive compensation package, and room for learning and growth in our organization. This is an environment in which things move quickly and you’ll have the opportunity to wear many hats. We have a casual dress code, offer flexible work hours and actively foster work-life balance, because anything else simply isn’t sustainable.', 'Python or PowerShell', 'Providing training to support development processes and tools', 'Vital is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer.\xa0 We do not discriminate based upon race, color, religion, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.', 'OUR IDEAL CANDIDATE', 'Gradle, Artifactory, BinTray', 'Provide leadership and mentorship to other DevOps Engineers', 'The Senior DevOps Engineer will bring 5+ years of experience working within agile teams creating and delivering quality software, as well as strong analytical skills, with excellent problem-solving abilities.\xa0 The Senior DevOps Engineer is flexible and highly adaptable to changes in development infrastructure and new technology standards and must strive to make improvements. Contributions will include software development process improvement, creation of software designs using design patterns, automation, and development technical support.\xa0 Basic knowledge of software configuration management, Release Engineering, and basic understanding of software development tools will be required.', 'Creating, improving and maintaining documentation', 'WHAT WE OFFER', 'COMPANY OVERVIEW', 'This job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job.\xa0 Duties, responsibilities, and activities may change at any time with or without notice.', 'Assisting in the development and deployment of Vital Images products and services', '\xa0', 'We are looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer to join our DevOps team. As a Senior DevOps Engineer on this team, you will have opportunities to solve complex problems that have an enormous impact on people’s lives.\xa0', 'At Vital, what we do matters. This is at the heart of every product we develop, every service we provide, and especially each member of our team. Vital is part of Canon Medical Systems, and together we lead the industry with the latest health imaging informatics solutions. We improve the quality of patient care by developing innovative products that enable the exchange, analysis and storage of clinical information across health care enterprises and communities. Our products handle millions of medical images and health records each day across the world. Vital Images experiences the best of both worlds with a dynamic and collaborative environment, casual culture, and agility of a mid-sized company, while having the support and resources of Canon.', 'We have product development teams in Minnesota, Ontario, Denmark, and The Netherlands. We value our team’s innovation, enthusiasm, and dedication to help improve the lives of patients. Do you want to be part of a passionate team that believes what we do matters? If so, a career with Vital Images might be right for you!', 'Leading the design and implementation of software features', 'Our award-winning Enterprise Imaging software solutions allow physicians to quickly, efficiently, and accurately access data and provide critical care to patients across the healthcare organization.\xa0 We do this by providing scalable and robust services that connect our clinical applications with many different hospital systems. \xa0', 'OUR TEAM', 'Atlassian suite (JIRA/Confluence/BitBucket)', 'Providing guidance on new technologies and continuous improvement in best practicesLeading the design and implementation of software featuresProviding technical expertise to architects, analysts, and other developersProvide leadership and mentorship to other DevOps EngineersResearching, implementation and development of software development toolsAssisting in the development and deployment of Vital Images products and servicesCreating, improving and maintaining documentationProviding training to support development processes and tools', 'Providing guidance on new technologies and continuous improvement in best practices', 'Providing technical expertise to architects, analysts, and other developers', 'Our Technology Stack: ', 'Python or PowerShellWindows Installer XML (WiX)Atlassian suite (JIRA/Confluence/BitBucket)Gradle, Artifactory, BinTray', 'Windows Installer XML (WiX)', 'Our product runs primarily on Windows and needs to scale from a single workstation to full enterprise spanning multiple datacenters. The data required to accomplish these tasks must be processed quickly, efficiently, and accurately so that care is not delayed.\xa0', 'We also have an excellent infrastructure for working from home including videoconferencing, web and mobile access to tools, remote access to our large virtual test environment, and a fast and secure network infrastructure. We enabled the vast majority of our workforce to quickly transition to remote work during the very early days of the #covid19 pandemic.', "Our Minnetonka, MN office is located about 12 miles southwest of downtown Minneapolis. Our office is near several walking paths and restaurants that are a quick drive away.\xa0 From free healthy snacks to Friday massages, an on-site deli, game room, gaming clubs, community lounge area with big screen TV's and quiet fireside conversation areas to recharge the batteries, we strive to bring balance to the workplace.\xa0\xa0 Our team at Vital loves what we do and has fun doing it together. We look forward to receiving an application from you!", 'Researching, implementation and development of software development tools', 'RESPONSIBILITIES']

Backed by venture investors such as Glynn Capital, Google Ventures, Redmile Group, dRx Capital, and Lux Capital, we are revolutionizing the clinical trial industry, one patient, at a time. To help us achieve our goal, we are seeking a razor-sharp\xa0Senior Application Security Engineer\xa0eager to make an impact within a mission-driven organization.", '\xa0Senior Application Security Engineer', 'Experience working in an iterative software development environment', 'Ability to articulate ideas to both technical and non-technical audiences', 'Strong analytical skills to solve complex problems with multiple variables and optimize the solutionMust be able to dive into problem-solving, set directions, give detailed technical guidance to the team, document and assist with the executionHigh level, written and verbal communication skills to both technical and non-technical leadersOutstanding organizational and leadership abilitiesProven track record of delivering results and meeting targetsGood blend of analytical skills, strategic thinking, planning, and implementationAbility to articulate ideas to both technical and non-technical audiencesCommitment to results; is focused and results-drivenExcellent time management skillsAction-oriented and innovative; able to translate broad goals into achievable stepsMotivating; knows how to influence and enable othersStrong problem solving and creative skills and the ability to exercise sound judgment and make decisions based on accurate and timely analysesHigh level of integrity and dependability with a strong sense of urgency and results-orientationAbility to foster and cultivate business opportunities and partnerships', 'The Senior Application Security Engineer is responsible for the application security of the entire software suite that the Technology department is creating, using, and managing including Science 37’s platform. Our mission is to make the Science 37 platform the safest and most secure Clinical Trials Management System that everybody trusts with their most sensitive data.', 'Drive the vision for security across Science 37 Technology departmentImprove current AWS infrastructure security and mobile application securityLead gap analysis and implement automation on AWSResponsible for vulnerability management and leading quick remediationsLead Engineering and Product for preventive solutions to solve application security issues at their rootsPartner with Engineering, Product, IT, Legal and Compliance and Quality Assurance to build programs to raise the application security awareness in the companyBuild relationships with engineers, product managers, QA staff to collaborate and create synergyFacilitate security meetingsEffectively communicate security risk to both technical and non-technical leaders across Science 37']
