job_title: National Security Solutions Data Scientist (Clearance Required)
job_text: ['Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.', '3+ years of professional experience developing and deploying machine learning solutions.', 'Hands-on experience with a cloud services provider', 'Understanding of NLP topics, including event and topic detection, named entity extraction, relation extraction, text classification and sentiment analysis models', 'Experience working with Elasticsearch', 'If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, you may contact us at info@primer.com.', 'What You’ll Do', 'Perform modeling tasks in support of prototypes and proofs-of-concept', 'Project management skills', 'Partner with our product management and engineering teams to identify and prioritize feature development based on customer feedback', "At Primer we use machine learning and natural language processing to automate the analysis of very large corpora of unstructured text. We build systems that read documents, extract insights, and write reports comparable to those of a human analyst. Our objective is to help our customers understand the world around them –– from geopolitical events and scientific research to changes in the risk profiles of companies. Our clients include some of the world’s largest corporations, financial institutions, and government agencies.\xa0You can learn more about Primer's technology and the sort of problems we solve at\xa0our blog, as well as recent\xa0media coverage\xa0of our work.", 'Bonus Points', 'Engage with customers and prospects to understand their problems and scope technical solutions', 'Requirements', 'You are an experienced data scientist with a passion for problem solving. You thrive on applying cutting-edge solutions to meaningful problems. Natural language processing intrigues you.\xa0Does this sound like you? As a Data Scientist at Primer, you’ll leverage your machine learning expertise to help national security organizations solve some of their toughest challenges.\xa0', 'Familiarity with container and orchestration technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes', "Primer is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics. Please see the United States Department of Labor's EEO poster and EEO poster supplement for additional information.", 'Primer', 'Full-stack development skills (including front-end)', '3+ years of Python experience', 'Produce technical content in support of national security focused business development and marketing', 'Active TS/SCI clearance', 'The world is changing at an accelerating rate and understanding the shifting landscapes has never been more critical.\xa0Primer\xa0is the premier artificial-intelligence powered platform that allows humans to get information that they need, instantly, in ways that until now have not been possible.\xa0We believe that truth is knowable; our mission is to free the curious to be their most human. We are building machines that can read natural language text documents, understand them, correlate them into events, and share what they learn by writing their own natural language text documents.\xa0', 'This position is specifically for work on a federal contract.\xa0The federal contract requires that all individuals working on this project be citizens of the United States', '\xa0', 'Explain machine learning concepts to non-technical stakeholders', 'United States citizenship is required for this position as a result of contractual requirements with the United States government.', 'Bachelor’s degree in computer science, engineering, statistics, computational linguistics, or another quantitative field', 'Hands-on experience with machine learning and NLP tools and libraries such as Numpy, Scipy, Scikit-learn, SpaCy, NLTK, Tensorflow, Keras and PyTorch', 'Linux proficiency - you’ll need to know your way around a Linux shell in order to run our software', 'Experience working in a customer success role', 'Train, deploy, and tune machine learning models on customer data sets', 'Direct experience with the isolated C2S region of AWS', 'Strong communication skills - you’ll be the face of Primer to customers', 'Experience working on an Agile development team', 'Ability to think about solutions from a customer perspective, establish conceptual connections between requirements and solutions']

['', 'Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.', 'Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc.', 'Work with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs.', 'Work with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems.', 'Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc. Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra. Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools: Azkaban, Luigi, Airflow, etc. Experience with AWS cloud services: EC2, EMR, RDS, Redshift Experience with stream-processing systems: Storm, Spark-Streaming, etc. Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala, etc. ', 'Experience with AWS cloud services: EC2, EMR, RDS, Redshift', 'Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.', 'Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra.', 'Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.', 'Keep our data separated and secure across national boundaries through multiple data centers and AWS regions.', 'A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.', 'Strong project management and organizational skills.', 'Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala, etc.', 'Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader.', 'Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.', "Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS 'big data' technologies.", "Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable 'big data' data stores.", 'Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.', 'Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.', "BS/BA degree or equivalent experience Advanced knowledge of application, data, and infrastructure architecture disciplines Understanding of software skills such as business analysis, development, maintenance, and software improvement Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc. Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS 'big data' technologies. Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics. Work with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs. Keep our data separated and secure across national boundaries through multiple data centers and AWS regions. Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader. Work with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems. The System Analyst will provide data on poor departure compliance or Ground Delay Program (GDP) delivery and will utilize an aviation tool set and various databases to compare daily performance to longer-term performance trends and provide a context for daily observations.\xa0', 'Determine the causes of questionable Traffic Management Initiatives (TMI) performance or excessive delays', 'Requirements:', 'Compare daily performance to longer-term performance trends, providing a context for daily operations', '***Prior FAA or industry equivelent experience is also required **', 'GDPs from the previous day. ['', 'Sharing Expertise:\xa0Our Senior Software Engineers should feel comfortable discussing technical decisions with fellow team members, performing code reviews, and providing mentorship for junior developers.', 'What You Will Be Responsible For:', 'Bottom line - in this role it is your responsibility to bring an innovative product vision to life, while balancing speed and maintainability as our platform continues to grow.', 'Are you excited to build innovative, modernized solutions for restaurant website hosting, online ordering, and automated marketing? Do you want to build a product that your friends and family can use on a daily basis? Do you want to work with cutting-edge technology? Are you passionate about building simple, user-friendly software that solves complex problems?\xa0If you answered yes to all questions, Popmenu could be the place for you!', 'Building Cool Stuff:\xa0Our Senior Software Engineer will collaborate with Product Managers, UX Designers, and other engineers to develop new features for both our consumer-facing and client-facing web apps.Writing Thoughtful Code:\xa0Writing clean, maintainable, and well-tested code should be second nature to our team, ensuring platform stability now and more easily expanding the product in the future.Sharing Expertise:\xa0Our Senior Software Engineers should feel comfortable discussing technical decisions with fellow team members, performing code reviews, and providing mentorship for junior developers.Looking for Improvements:\xa0Our team is always on the lookout for improvements, such as possible performance gains or better coding style, and are comfortable suggesting them.', 'We work with extreme agility and fluidity, and need your help improving that velocity as we scale up smartly. You can have a major impact on how our processes take shape to achieve our goals.', 'Are you excited to build innovative, modernized solutions for restaurant website hosting, online ordering, and automated marketing? Do you want to build a product that your friends and family can use on a daily basis? Do you want to work with cutting-edge technology? Are you passionate about building simple, user-friendly software that solves complex problems?', 'Building Cool Stuff:\xa0Our Senior Software Engineer will collaborate with Product Managers, UX Designers, and other engineers to develop new features for both our consumer-facing and client-facing web apps.', 'We hire exceptionally bright, motivated people who are passionate about helping great restaurants reach their full potential. We offer a flexible work environment, a pioneering concept, a product our clients love, and talented teammates. This is a chance to make great things happen and truly be a difference maker which includes meaningful equity opportunity for long-term performers.', 'Who We Are:', 'About This Opportunity:', 'What You Bring to the Table:', 'You have demonstrated proficiency in a modern front-end framework (such as React JS) and a backend web framework (such as Ruby on Rails)', 'Looking for Improvements:\xa0Our team is always on the lookout for improvements, such as possible performance gains or better coding style, and are comfortable suggesting them.', 'Your visibility will be high, with daily opportunity to share wins and learnings with the entire company.', 'You are comfortable working with SQL and have basic DB performance knowledge', 'You have experience in a professional software development environment, with a degree in Computer Science or years of equivalent experienceYou have great communication skills and can collaborate closely with product managers and designers to help scope work, set priorities, and facilitate technical discussionYou have demonstrated proficiency in a modern front-end framework (such as React JS) and a backend web framework (such as Ruby on Rails)You have familiarity with an end-to-end testing framework (such as RSpec or Cypress)You are comfortable working with SQL and have basic DB performance knowledge', 'We offer a competitive salary and equity opportunity for strong performers.', 'Flexibility and freedom are high. We work from home often. We care about results above all else.', 'You have familiarity with an end-to-end testing framework (such as RSpec or Cypress)', 'To find great ideas you have to break some stuff. Here you are expected to fail fast, fail smartly and fail forward. You’ll have tremendous leeway in trying out your ideas, no matter how speculative.', 'Writing Thoughtful Code:\xa0Writing clean, maintainable, and well-tested code should be second nature to our team, ensuring platform stability now and more easily expanding the product in the future.', 'Popmenu is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to help us continue building innovative online experiences for restaurant owners and their customers. Our ideal candidate would utilize both their React & Ruby on Rails skills to expand our awesome product and help scale our technology into the big leagues as we enter the next phase of our rapidly growing company.', 'You will work with and learn from a team that is experienced in developing products that have been utilized by millions of users and tens of thousands of clients on a monthly basis', 'Popmenu is a rapidly growing, venture-backed SaaS business in the restaurant/hospitality sector with millions of users each month. We help restaurants take real-time control of their menu and turn it into an essential tool for attracting and engaging guests. We are helping drive the future of restaurant guest engagement by taking a revolutionary approach with our patent-pending, cloud-based, dynamic, interactive platform.\xa0', 'We offer a competitive salary and equity opportunity for strong performers.Flexibility and freedom are high. We work from home often. We care about results above all else.We’re early enough that you can make significant contributions to the company’s success, but have enough in place already that you won’t have to create everything from scratch.We work with extreme agility and fluidity, and need your help improving that velocity as we scale up smartly. You can be yourself.', 'You have experience in a professional software development environment, with a degree in Computer Science or years of equivalent experience', 'You have great communication skills and can collaborate closely with product managers and designers to help scope work, set priorities, and facilitate technical discussion', 'What’s In It For You:', 'We’re early enough that you can make significant contributions to the company’s success, but have enough in place already that you won’t have to create everything from scratch.', 'We have a great culture and environment that emphasizes collaboration, energy and openness above corporate formality. job_title: Sr Principal Data Engineer [Cloud] - Secureworks - Austin, TX; Atlanta, GA; or US Remote
job_text: ['', 'Minimum of 3 years of experience with big data platforms (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, HBase, etc) ', 'About Secureworks', 'Role Overview', 'Minimum of 2 years of experience with scripting languages like Python, Ruby, Perl, Bash, etc.', 'Design, build, launch, and maintain infrastructure to support large-scale data routing, streaming and historical processing, data warehousing, and container orchestration.', 'Minimum of 6 years of experience in data engineering, data modeling, ETL development, or data warehousing.Minimum of 2 years of experience of software engineering in Scala.Minimum of 2 years of experience with scripting languages like Python, Ruby, Perl, Bash, etc.Minimum of 3 years of experience with big data platforms (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, HBase, etc) Experience with Amazon AWS, Google GCP, or similar cloud provider.', 'Minimum Requirements', 'Experience working with containers and container orchestration solutions such as Docker, Kubernetes, Mesos, etc.Experience with stream-processing systems, such as NiFi/StreamSets, Kafka, Storm/Heron, Spark, or Flink.Experience with distributed NoSQL databases, such as HBase, Cassandra, or Accumulo.', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Experience with stream-processing systems, such as NiFi/StreamSets, Kafka, Storm/Heron, Spark, or Flink.', 'Experience working with containers and container orchestration solutions such as Docker, Kubernetes, Mesos, etc.', 'Employ a variety of languages and tools to marry big data systems together and hunt down opportunities to acquire new data from other systems.', 'Experience with distributed NoSQL databases, such as HBase, Cassandra, or Accumulo.', 'Work effectively on a geographically distributed team to deliver high quality software against aggressive schedules. ', 'Design, build, launch, and maintain infrastructure to support large-scale data routing, streaming and historical processing, data warehousing, and container orchestration.Employ a variety of languages and tools to marry big data systems together and hunt down opportunities to acquire new data from other systems.Recommend and implement ways to improve data reliability, efficiency, and quality. Collaborate with data scientists and security researchers to productize new methods of extracting information from structured and unstructured data.Work effectively on a geographically distributed team to deliver high quality software against aggressive schedules. ', 'Preferred Experience', 'Minimum of 6 years of experience in data engineering, data modeling, ETL development, or data warehousing.', 'Experience with Amazon AWS, Google GCP, or similar cloud provider.', 'Collaborate with data scientists and security researchers to productize new methods of extracting information from structured and unstructured data.', 'Minimum of 2 years of experience of software engineering in Scala.', 'Recommend and implement ways to improve data reliability, efficiency, and quality. ']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer, Machine Learning Infrastructure
job_text: ['', 'A supportive, inclusive atmosphere on a team that values your contributions', 'You Will\xa0', 'You have 5 or more years experience working on large-scale software infrastructure systemsYou have 3 or more years experience developing machine learning infrastructureYou are comfortable working and iterating on evolving workflows and requirementsYou have previously built large-scale APIs and libraries for Python or GoYou are comfortable working in SQL (BigQuery) on data sets\xa0You can take complete ownership of a feature or projectYou have a record of leading work across departments', 'BuzzFeed is the world’s leading tech-powered media company, with a cross-platform news and entertainment network that reaches hundreds of millions of people globally. The company aims to spread truth and joy across the internet by producing articles, lists, quizzes, videos, original series; lifestyle content through brands including Tasty, the world’s largest social food network; original reporting and investigative journalism through BuzzFeed News; strategic partnerships, licensing and product development through BuzzFeed Marketing; and original productions across broadcast, cable, SVOD, film and digital platforms for BuzzFeed Studios.\xa0', 'You are comfortable working in SQL (BigQuery) on data sets\xa0', 'You have 5 or more years experience working on large-scale software infrastructure systems', 'At BuzzFeed, we believe our work benefits from the diverse perspectives of our employees. As such, BuzzFeed celebrates inclusion and is committed to equal opportunity employment. At BuzzFeed, you can expect:', 'BuzzFeed', 'A generous benefits program featuring PTO, unlimited sick time, comprehensive medical benefits, a family leave policy, access to mental health platforms, retirement plans, gym and wellness discounts, and much more.', 'Use your experience to advocate for best practices in machine learning across the organization', "All job applications\xa0must be received through the official BuzzFeed Jobs board (https://www.buzzfeed.com/about/jobs), including referrals.\xa0It is BuzzFeed's practice to not schedule job interviews until after an application is submitted through our jobs board.", 'You are comfortable working and iterating on evolving workflows and requirements', 'Develop new capabilities and processes that increase the speed of model development and experimentation', 'You’ll report to the Data Group Lead in New York, surrounded by passionate people who are generous with their time and want to help you grow at BuzzFeed. You’ll work with engineering, product, design, and data colleagues globally across time zones. We are working remotely, and we expect to eventually re-open our offices when it is safe to return, in 2021.', 'Develop services and libraries that power machine learning infrastructureWork with diverse teams of product managers, designers, software engineers, data engineers, and data scientistsUse your experience to advocate for best practices in machine learning across the organizationDevelop new capabilities and processes that increase the speed of model development and experimentationMentor software engineers and other members of the team', 'Develop services and libraries that power machine learning infrastructure', 'An attractive and equitable compensation package, including salary and stock options', 'Work with diverse teams of product managers, designers, software engineers, data engineers, and data scientists', 'You have 3 or more years experience developing machine learning infrastructure', 'You have a record of leading work across departments', 'You can take complete ownership of a feature or project', 'The Role\xa0', 'You Have', 'Opportunities for personal and professional growth through work experience, offerings from our in-house Learning @ BuzzFeed team, our Employee Resource Groups, and more', 'BuzzFeed is the world’s leading independent digital media and tech company, with a cross-platform news and entertainment network that reaches hundreds of millions of people globally and spreads Joy and Truth across the internet.\xa0', 'BuzzFeed is looking for an experienced software engineer to help us build the next generation of machine learning infrastructure. We need your help and expertise to build tools and platforms to allow data scientists and engineers alike to iterate quickly on training, evaluating, and deploying models. Your work will affect the way readers around the world experience the best content on the internet.\xa0', 'Mentor software engineers and other members of the team', 'Life at BuzzFeed', 'Our portfolio of brands are household names that people rely on to inform and entertain, including: BuzzFeed, BuzzFeed News, Tasty, Nifty, Bring Me, Cocoa Butter, Pero Like, Worth It, and Unsolved to name a few!\xa0These properties and their Creators reach over 134M people a month through articles, lists, videos, animations, quizzes, podcasts, original series, newsletters and more.', '\ufeffBuzzFeed is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to, and will not be discriminated against based on age, race, gender, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, veteran status, disability or any other protected category.', 'You have previously built large-scale APIs and libraries for Python or Go', 'A supportive, inclusive atmosphere on a team that values your contributionsOpportunities for personal and professional growth through work experience, offerings from our in-house Learning @ BuzzFeed team, our Employee Resource Groups, and moreAn attractive and equitable compensation package, including salary and stock options']

['', 'You’re a problem solver, someone who is sought to help break down problems and brainstorm solutions to the trickiest of issues.', 'You will suggest improvements to our stack that reduce complexity, increase consistency, and improve performance.', 'As a staff software engineer you will be deeply involved with all of our most important projects.\xa0 From building new microservices to evaluating new technologies, you’ll be a technical leader working with other engineers to identify problems, develop solutions, and write code that is effective, maintainable, performant, and reliable.', 'You will swiftly and intelligently respond to issues as they arise.\xa0 Identifying the best course of action over both the short term and long.', 'Our brands answer unmet consumer needs, but our company is a place of inclusion and innovation that attracts some of the brightest minds across industries, geographies, and backgrounds. Whether we have a team of 3 or 300, our core values and our startup mentality remain; we value continuous improvement and learning, teamwork and collaboration, creative problem solving, and open and direct dialogue and feedback. You always go above and beyond our expectations and deliver your work in a timely fashion.', 'What you will accomplish', 'Harry’s Services Team builds and maintains a suite of solutions that can power eCommerce sites for multiple brands in multiple regions.\xa0 We are a small, autonomous team with grand ambitions.\xa0 We make decisions empirically and we choose the right solutions for the job.', 'We respect the laws enforced by the EEOC and are dedicated to going above and beyond in fostering diversity across our company.', 'You have professional experience using TypeScript or Node for API development.\xa0 You’ve worked with microservices.\xa0 You have an understanding of infrastructure as code.\xa0 You’ve worked with popular AWS solutions like Lambdas and API Gateway.', 'You will create exemplars, frameworks, and other work products that enhance the ability of the services team to work better.', "Here's who you'll work with", 'About the team', 'Harry’s is committed to bringing together individuals from different backgrounds and perspectives. We strive to create an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive, feel a sense of belonging, and do great work together.', 'You will contribute code and documentation to services projects.\xa0 You will test your own work and that of others.\xa0 You will identify edge cases and manage them gracefully.', '\xa0', 'Working with Services Engineers, Product Management, Data Engineering, and Web Engineering', 'Working on the Services Team', 'You foster a sense of community by proactively welcoming new talent, new perspectives, and new ideas in your day-to-day and cross-functional work.', 'You will be responsible for maintaining quality deliverables by all members of the project\xa0 team, defining the technical tasks required to achieve the project’s objectives.', 'You will drive technical decisions, understanding the point of view of other project team members while balancing the business requirements to synthesize a best compromise solution.You will contribute code and documentation to services projects.\xa0 You will test your own work and that of others.\xa0 You will identify edge cases and manage them gracefully.You will swiftly and intelligently respond to issues as they arise.\xa0 Identifying the best course of action over both the short term and long.You will suggest improvements to our stack that reduce complexity, increase consistency, and improve performance.You will be responsible for maintaining quality deliverables by all members of the project\xa0 team, defining the technical tasks required to achieve the project’s objectives.You will create exemplars, frameworks, and other work products that enhance the ability of the services team to work better.', 'Harry’s Inc. started in 2013 with simple, fairly priced products that delivered an amazing experience to guys every day. Since then, Harry’s expanded to the UK, developed relationships with retailers such as Target and Walmart, expanded our grooming brand into a personal care powerhouse, and launched a women’s brand called Flamingo.', 'You’re someone that is happy to document your work so that it can be shared and used to elevate the whole team.', 'Reporting to the Senior Manger, ServicesWorking on the Services TeamWorking with Services Engineers, Product Management, Data Engineering, and Web Engineering', 'The key to our success? Our amazing people. From chemists, mechanical engineers, CX associates, to creative directors, sourcing managers, and logistics specialists, Harry’s team is composed of some of the most brilliant, diverse, and humble people you’ll ever meet.\xa0', 'Harry’s is an Equal Opportunity Employer, providing equal employment and advancement opportunities to all individuals. ['', 'You will help with your expertise analyze complex issues in production and write postmortems in partnership with other engineering teams, but also help reproduce some of our past incidents in our staging and production environment at large scales to verify in practice our fixes (several teams, high complexity).', ' You have significant programming experience (5+ years) and have a willingness to dive into unfamiliar codebases and find obscure bugs. You have architected, built, and operated distributed systems to solve problems at high scale in cloud-based environments. You have been on-call for critical systems and you have experience handling incidents using a formal organization process. You want to work in a fast-paced, high-growth environment that respects its engineers and customers. ', 'You have experience in cross-team, cross-functional projects.', ' You will help with your expertise analyze complex issues in production and write postmortems in partnership with other engineering teams, but also help reproduce some of our past incidents in our staging and production environment at large scales to verify in practice our fixes (several teams, high complexity). You will get to contribute in the development of our self-service chaos platform implemented on top of Kubernetes. You will get to help define for the whole company how we respond to incidents and build tooling along the way to streamline that process. You will also help train our on-call staff, preparing newcomers to their on-call responsibilities but also refreshing the rest of the staff with what we’ve learnt from past incidents. ', 'Bonus Points', 'Requirements', 'You have architected, built, and operated distributed systems to solve problems at high scale in cloud-based environments.', " You've worked on chaos engineering projects before. You’ve been an Incident Commander or have contributed to defining an incident response process. You have Linux/Kubernetes experience. You have experience in cross-team, cross-functional projects. ", 'You have been on-call for critical systems and you have experience handling incidents using a formal organization process.', 'You will get to help define for the whole company how we respond to incidents and build tooling along the way to streamline that process. You will also help train our on-call staff, preparing newcomers to their on-call responsibilities but also refreshing the rest of the staff with what we’ve learnt from past incidents.', 'You’ve been an Incident Commander or have contributed to defining an incident response process.', 'Equal Opportunity At Datadog', 'You have significant programming experience (5+ years) and have a willingness to dive into unfamiliar codebases and find obscure bugs.', 'You have Linux/Kubernetes experience.', 'The Team', 'You Will', 'The Opportunity', "You've worked on chaos engineering projects before.", 'Your Privacy', 'You want to work in a fast-paced, high-growth environment that respects its engineers and customers.', 'About Datadog', 'You will get to contribute in the development of our self-service chaos platform implemented on top of Kubernetes.']

['', '•\tLead by example and mentor team members in all aspects of planning, development, and testing.', '•\tManage your work using git, agile practices, and our CI/CD pipeline.', 'Some technologies we use: .net core/5, C#, React, NodeJS, Typescript, TigerGraph, Postgres, AWS (EKS, SNS, SQS, S3, RDS, Elasticache, Cloudwatch, Athena), Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Prometheus, Grafana.', '•\tExposure to cloud-based providers such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.', '•\tWrite structured, tested, and maintainable code that is easily understood by other developers.', '•\tPromote state of the art technology trends, standards, frameworks, and tooling.', '•\tCollaborate with other teams and across departments to solve complex technical problems and deliver new features and products.', '•\tExperience working in any of the following: React, NodeJS, Javascript/Typescript, Sass/Less/Scss, Webpack, SQL, Graph Databases, or similar.', 'Variant is looking for a Senior Software Engineer with a diverse background to help us achieve our mission: Reengineer trucking for good! Your job is to design and implement web-based applications and services that are used by Variant for our driver-focused functions. Your role will blend knowledge of web technologies, software engineering, and UI/UX to develop applications in a cloud environment.\xa0', '•\tKnowledge of designing and implementing RESTful web services.', '•\tDesign APIs and data models to work with mobile, applications, and event-driven architectures.', 'What you bring:', '•\tBuild scalable applications and components with React, NodeJS, and Postgres.', 'What you will do:', 'Variant is leading the way in disrupting the trucking industry. We leverage real time data to automate and optimize logistics to improve truck drivers’ lives. We are continually innovating using the latest technologies to solve complex problems and deliver solutions that enhance the drivers’ experience. If you want to contribute your knowledge and skills to reform one of the largest occupations in America, then join our growing team and make an impact.\xa0', 'Position Summary:', '•\tSolid understanding of web technologies including the benefits and challenges.', '•\tThree or more years of relevant experience.', '•\tComfortable building and maintaining large-scale, high-availability applications.', '•\tFamiliarity with containerization and orchestration using Docker and Kubernetes.']

['', 'A background like this helps:\xa0', 'Although you enjoy making technical decisions, you take great joy in helping others make great decisions on their own.', 'The team has clear production service level objectives (SLOs) and solutions to meet and monitor them.', 'Built and managed production applications using JVM stack and Postgres', 'The Data Networks team helps grow crypto by building trusted networks of transactions and people. A Senior Software Engineer on the this team thrives on not just designing and implementing complex systems but also operating them. They are a mentor who grows the skills of their teammates and rejoices in the ripple effects across the company. We measure our success by how well we enable our customers to fight crime and meet compliance regulations.', 'A background like this helps:', 'You have been both a successful mentor and mentee.\xa0', 'You belong here\xa0', 'At Chainalysis, we help government agencies, cryptocurrency businesses, and financial institutions track and investigate illicit activity on the blockchain, allowing them to engage confidently with cryptocurrency. We take care of our people with great benefits, professional development opportunities, and fun.', 'JVM expertise. We mostly use Java but also appreciate other languages.', 'Our product suite has cutting-edge features that detect market manipulation, fraud, anomalous activity, and more.\xa0', 'You appreciate the importance of team culture and have been an active contributor to a culture that thrives on giving first and the respect and diversity of opinions', 'The other members of the team eagerly seek out your opinion on problems they are trying to solve.\xa0', 'In one year you’ll know you were successful if…', 'You belong here', "You have successfully developed cloud-native data ingestion and aggregation processes that handle gigabytes of data per day.You've built a scalable API service on AWS that handles thousands of requests per second.Our product suite has cutting-edge features that detect market manipulation, fraud, anomalous activity, and more.\xa0The team has clear production service level objectives (SLOs) and solutions to meet and monitor them.We’ve modernized our stack and moved to a streaming architecture.The other members of the team eagerly seek out your opinion on problems they are trying to solve.\xa0", 'Built solutions for real world customer problems.', 'We’ve modernized our stack and moved to a streaming architecture.', 'Have a strong bias to ship.', 'We encourage applicants across any race, ethnicity, gender/gender expression, age, religion, ability, experience, and more. We can’t wait to meet you.\xa0', 'Although not necessary, experience with Bitcoin or other digital currencies is a plus!', 'Experience building data pipelines and implementing event-driven architectures.', 'The Engineers working at Chainalysis work on systems that are the highest fidelity of risk data within a crypto business. Our job is to bring transparency to the cryptocurrency ecosystem and build trust on blockchains. To do that, we build systems that detect fraud in real-time.', 'Previously designed and implemented cloud-native micro services based distributed systems.Experience building data pipelines and implementing event-driven architectures.Built and managed production applications using JVM stack and PostgresExperience in scaling/sharding of databasesBuilt solutions for real world customer problems.Have a strong bias to ship.Although you enjoy making technical decisions, you take great joy in helping others make great decisions on their own.You have been both a successful mentor and mentee.\xa0JVM expertise. We mostly use Java but also appreciate other languages.Have experience with Terraform and Kubernetes.You appreciate the importance of team culture and have been an active contributor to a culture that thrives on giving first and the respect and diversity of opinionsAlthough not necessary, experience with Bitcoin or other digital currencies is a plus!', "You've built a scalable API service on AWS that handles thousands of requests per second.", 'Experience in scaling/sharding of databases', 'At Chainalysis, we believe that diversity of experience and thought makes us stronger. With both customers and employees around the world, we are committed to ensuring our team reflects the unique communities around us. Some of the ways we’re ensuring we keep learning are an internal Diversity Committee, Days of Reflection throughout the year including International Women’s Day, Juneteenth, Harvey Milk Day, and International Migrant’s Day, and a commitment to continue revisiting and reevaluating our diversity culture.\xa0', 'You have successfully developed cloud-native data ingestion and aggregation processes that handle gigabytes of data per day.', 'Previously designed and implemented cloud-native micro services based distributed systems.', 'Have experience with Terraform and Kubernetes.']

', 'Agile experience and knowledge with sprint cycles, sprint planning, stand-ups, functional and regression, UAT test cycles', 'If you’re ready for high-impact, you’re ready for CDK.', "CDK Global knows you have passions outside of work. You have family, friends, sporting events, and lots of things going on. That's why we offer a comprehensive benefits package to not only take care of you but your family as well. All of our benefits are effective the first day of employment including 401K matching, paid time off to re-energize, donate your time to volunteer in your community, and tuition reimbursement to name a few.", 'Power the PossibilitiesThe CDK Global technology team is looking for collaborative innovators who are passionate about making their mark on emerging enterprise software products. We’re building and developing cloud technology for the automotive retail industrythat will change the landscape for automotive dealers, original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and the customers they serve.Be Part of Something BiggerEach year, more than three percent of the U.S. gross domestic product (GDP) is attributed to the auto industry, which flows through our customer, the auto dealer. It’s time you joined an evolving marketplace where research and developmentinvestment is measured in the tens of billions. It’s time you were a part of something bigger.We’re expanding our workforce – engineers, architects, developers and more – onboarding early adopters who can optimize, pivot and keep pace with ever-evolving development roadmaps and applications.Join Our TeamGrowth potential, flexibility and material impact on the success and quality of a next-gen, enterprise software product make CDK an excellent choice for those who thrive in challenging, fast-paced engineering environments.The possibilities for impact are endless. We have exceptional opportunities to evolve our industry by driving change through new technology.', "Bachelor's Degree in MIS, Computer Science, Engineering", 'High degree of initiative and self-motivation with a willingness and ability to lean and take on challenging opportunities.', 'Position Summary ', 'Ability to clearly articulate issues/defects to software developers', 'Join Our Team', 'At CDK, we pride ourselves on having a diverse workforce. ', 'Front-end programming skills i.e. HTML, CSS, JS', "Power the PossibilitiesThe CDK Global technology team is looking for collaborative innovators who are passionate about making their mark on emerging enterprise software products. We're building and developing cloud technology for the automotive retail industry that will change the landscape for automotive dealers, original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and the customers they serve.If you're ready for high-impact, you're ready for CDK.", 'Strong communication skills, both verbal and written, with strong relationship, collaborative and organization skills.', 'Creative problem-solving, proficient debugging and profiling', 'Automation framework knowledge; Automaton for web application, web services, performance and mobile devices', 'CDK Global knows you have passions outside of work.  You have family, friends, sporting events, and lots of things going on.   That’s why we offer a comprehensive benefits package to not only take care of you but your family as well.   All of our benefits are effective the first day of employment including 401K matching, paid time off to re-energize, donate your time to volunteer in your community, and tuition reimbursement to name a few.', 'Power the Possibilities', 'The Entry Level Software Engineer role are for those individuals looking for a growth driven environment that is both challenging yet fun- being part of a dynamic organization that thrives on making a material difference to CDK Global and the automobile industry. This position will have support and mentorship as well as opportunities for training & growth. The role will require hard work, dedication, creativity and tenacity. ', 'Test management tools: JIRA, Zephyr for JIRA, reporting tools and plugins', 'Be Part of Something Bigger', "For a growing software company, Quality is critical directly tied to building trust and confidence in CDK Global's products and services with our customers. This position will start and grow in the Quality organization focused on automation, testing, reporting, analytics in a devops/agile environment for the industry leading Automobile software products at CDK Global. Quality software engineers will work to help with various users and departments to determine test requirements and insure finished product matches design criteria in a devOps/Agile landscape. They will also leverage training, creativity, and tenacity to explore ways to automate testing and introduction of new testing/QA methods. Individuals may also have reporting, analytics, data science opportunities for test, defect, support data derived from QA activities. Quality software engineers will work with and engage with the development team & product teams to understand code and code/build test cases/plans along with test planning, execution and reporting. In other words, in the Quality space, we look to help find ways to ‘break things' but in a good way. Experience with automation or scripting is a plus. Previous experience with software testing is preferred. Critical thinking skills are highly valued.", 'Experience with the below a plus but not a requirement', 'Automation framework knowledge; Automaton for web application, web services, performance and mobile devicesTest management tools: JIRA, Zephyr for JIRA, reporting tools and pluginsAPI testing and related tools such as Postman, Rest-assured, Soap UIAgile experience and knowledge with sprint cycles, sprint planning, stand-ups, functional and regression, UAT test cyclesEye for detail and focus on customer-centric workflowsFront-end programming skills i.e. HTML, CSS, JSWebsite creation and editing skillsMultimedia Video creation and editing skillsAbility to source and manipulate graphics using Adobe Creative Suite (e.g. Photoshop)', 'CDK Global: Evolving the Automotive Retail Experience. At CDK Global, we love creating a great fun-loving work environment. We create software solutions that are used by the majority of the Automotive Dealers in the US and around the world with more than 28,000 dealer sites in over 100 countries and nearly 9,000 employees worldwide.  We thrive on providing solutions to dealer problems that no one else can!', 'At CDK, we pride ourselves on having a diverse workforce. We value and celebrate the uniqueness of individuals and the different perspectives they provide. We offer equal opportunity employment regardless of race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability status, age, marital status, or protected veteran status.']

You can expect to', 'Everyone matters - Get things moving quickly and take your own decisions within a fast-paced company culture\xa0-\xa0we live agile and flat hierarchies', 'Previous work experience in an Agile environment', 'Your responsibilities', 'Develop software libraries and APIs for our AOSP-based operating system, leveraging the newest Android SDKsDevelop proof-of-concept apps using state-of-the-art image processing and deep learning librariesWorking as part of an agile team using the latest tools for rapid development, continuous integration, and deploymentActively participate in all phase of software development life cycleEliciting requirements from 3rd party developers and delivering APIs to accelerate the development of their edge-based applications and distributed solutions', '\xa0', 'Profound software engineering experience, focusing in Android Development', 'Experience with the latest Deep Learning libraries and tools such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, etc.', 'Additional Information', 'BS Degree in Computer Science or Software Engineering', 'Some experience with native Android development using C/C++ and Android NDK', 'Our AOSP-based operating system enables third party developers to build headless Android apps that run on directly on IP cameras from a wide range of manufacturers.\xa0Our team’s role is to enable the creation of these apps by building software frameworks, advanced proofs-of-concept, and development tools to speed adoption of the platform.\xa0To do this we work in the areas of computer vision, deep learning, analytics, and Internet of Things.\xa0We work in close collaboration with third party development partners to gather their requirements and make sure our software is helping them to be more effective at building analytic apps.', 'Feel comfortable - We offer a comfortable working space, diverse employee discounts and free drinks as well as home office opportunities', 'Get the best out of both worlds - Enjoy the benefits of an dynamic start up environment and the security and expertise of a corporate company', 'Actively participate in all phase of software development life cycle', 'Develop proof-of-concept apps using state-of-the-art image processing and deep learning libraries', 'MS Degree in Computer ScienceExperience with IoT applications and embedded developmentExperience with Computer Vision libraries such as openCVExperience with the latest Deep Learning libraries and tools such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, etc.Experience in developing APIsExperience in architecting and engineering distributed applications using multiple communication protocols such as REST, MQTT, Web Sockets, RTSP', 'Have fun at work! — Our teams love to have fun and so will you', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'We are working to build an open application platform for IP cameras.\xa0\xa0Using our Android-based (AOSP) operating system, developers can build edge-based computer vision applications to solve traditional problems in the area of security and safety as well as advanced use cases for business intelligence.\xa0We are enabling our partners to develop applications in domains such as smart cities, airport security, brick-and-mortar retail analytics, smart buildings, manufacturing, and more.\xa0', 'BS Degree in Computer Science or Software EngineeringProfound software engineering experience, focusing in Android DevelopmentPrevious work experience in an Agile environmentSome experience with native Android development using C/C++ and Android NDK']

['', 'Own the products that you build, become the domain expert, and be actively involved in strategic direction and product decisions', 'We’re looking for someone who has:', 'Experience integrating with third party web services across a variety of technologies, e.g. REST, SOAP, SMPP', 'Experience using agile methodologies and tools', 'Strong software design and architecture skills', '5+ years of experience shipping high-quality products', "An ability to think through customer's pain points and requirements and to come up with a simple, elegant solution\xa0", 'Hands-on software development experience in one or more modern JavaScript frameworks (AngularJS, React, Vue, etc)', "The Payments Product team at Boku is expanding and we are looking for a Senior Full Stack Engineer to join us. This position is based in the Austin, Texas area but will be working remotely and collaboratively with the team in the San Francisco Bay Area. As part of the Payments Product team, you will be responsible for end-to-end development of our payment products and features. You will be challenged with building scalable, customizable, and frictionless checkout experience for millions of Boku's customers around the world.", 'About Boku:', 'Participate in all phases of the software development lifecycle, including design, development, testing and release', 'Job Summary', 'Incorporated in 2008, Boku is one of the world’s leading providers of carrier billing and mobile identity solutions. Using nothing more than a user’s mobile phone, Boku’s technology can verify a user’s identity, execute a payment, or provision a new service, radically simplifying common, everyday mobile interactions between consumers and businesses. This is possible because Boku’s platform can access the internal billing, identity, and sales systems of mobile operators globally. Businesses who utilize Boku’s platform include major brands such as Apple, Google, Microsoft, Sony, Facebook, Spotify, Netflix, Paypal, Experian, Fiserv, Western Union, Uber, and Discover. Boku was originally financed through top-tier investors including Andreessen Horowitz, Benchmark, DAG Ventures, Index Ventures, Khosla Ventures and NEA. Today, Boku is publicly traded on the AIM Market of the London Stock Exchange (AIM: BOKU.L)', 'Sharing knowledge and drive best practices in frontend web development across the Engineering teams by giving brown bags, writing article, etc', 'Meet eligibility requirements to work in the US', 'Hands-on software development experience in Java.', 'Ability to work collaboratively and effectively with cross-functional teams: Product Management, Quality Assurance, Finance, Merchant Onboarding, etc.', '\xa0', 'Experience with some (or all) of the following technologies/frameworks/tools: Maven, Git, MySQL, JMS, Spring, JPA/Hibernate, Jersey, Jetty, Kubernetes.', "Work hands-on with a highly skilled team of Engineers and Product Managers to ideate, build, and improve Boku payment products and featuresAn ability to think through customer's pain points and requirements and to come up with a simple, elegant solution\xa0Design, build, and enhance the frontend UI and backend APIs required for the products.Own the products that you build, become the domain expert, and be actively involved in strategic direction and product decisionsParticipate in all phases of the software development lifecycle, including design, development, testing and releaseMentors and coaches’ other engineersSharing knowledge and drive best practices in frontend web development across the Engineering teams by giving brown bags, writing article, etc", 'Experience building and maintaining high-volume, customer-facing product in the cloud (AWS, GCP, etc).', 'What you will do:', 'Design, build, and enhance the Are you ready to level up your career and build mastery in AWS, distributed software patterns, and optimization?\xa0Are you a rising star looking for an amazing opportunity to grow?', 'As a Software Engineer III on the Platform Team at mParticle, you will have the opportunity to work on important key initiatives impacting our core platform infrastructure, costs, scaling, and stability.\xa0\xa0', 'Desired Experience', '2-5+ years of professional hands-on experience developing software', 'About mParticle', 'Create and maintain platform / cloud infrastructure documentation and performance notes', 'Founded in 2013, mParticle is the leading customer data platform that unlocks the full power of data for businesses. A trusted partner among renowned brands such as Airbnb, Foursquare, Hulu, King, and Spotify among many others, the mParticle platform has grown to manage over 1 billion mobile users each month, capturing over $5 billion in ecommerce transactions and processes over 250 billion API calls. Recognized as one of Crain’s 100 Best Places to Work in New York City and named to Gartner’s “Cool Vendors in Mobile App Development” list, mParticle has 45 employees and is headquartered in New York City with offices in San Francisco, Florida, Seattle and London.', 'Experience with DataDog, Cloud Trail, or SumoLogic', '\ufeff', 'Our clients include marketing and engineering functions for some of the largest apps in the world and our platform processes nearly one-third of the world’s smartphone traffic.', 'Responsibilities', '*At this time, mParticle is unable to provide visa sponsorship. unfortunately.', 'Employment opportunities are available to all applicants without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Here at mParticle, everyone is equal. We\xa0believe strongly in our values\xa0and are looking for someone who demonstrates empathy and sincerity to all roles and teammates.\xa0', 'Research and diagnose areas for AWS cost savings', 'Design, develop, implement, and test technical solutions based on business requirementsCreate and maintain platform / cloud infrastructure documentation and performance notesDesign, build, and maintain critical cloud infrastructure components related to scaling, cost monitoring, and performanceResearch and diagnose areas for AWS cost savings', 'Design, build, and maintain critical cloud infrastructure components related to scaling, cost monitoring, and performance', 'Demonstrated remote-friendly work practices', 'Experience in at least 1 scripting language', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills and experience communicating technical information to non-technical people', '\xa0', 'If the above sounds intriguing, here are some details to help you determine whether this is the right role for you!', '2-5+ years of professional hands-on experience developing software1+ years of professional experience with AWSExperience with DataDog, Cloud Trail, or SumoLogicIn-depth knowledge of C# and .NET CoreExperience in at least 1 scripting languageA natural problem solverDemonstrated remote-friendly work practicesExcellent oral and written communication skills and experience communicating technical information to non-technical people', '1+ years of professional experience with AWS', 'Design, develop, implement, and test technical solutions based on business requirements', 'Here at mParticle we embrace the differences that make us unique. ['', 'You will work closely with the founders and our educational providers (think universities, museums, cultural organizations) to test and define what we build.', 'Company Description:', 'You will build and own end-to-end (hands-on) development of large parts of our product.You will work closely with the founders and our educational providers (think universities, museums, cultural organizations) to test and define what we build.', "We want to empower the world's best educational providers with the digital tools they need to engage their communities online. They are all motivated to define their digital presence and deliver the same connective & interactive experiences that they have perfected in-person. Live, virtual classes have become increasingly popular and effective, but we are in the early innings of what can be done to create a sense of connection and community online. We are building tools to allow these organizations to better design, deliver, and manage their live, virtual education initiatives. In doing so, we will be creating a trusted marketplace that connects communities of lifelong learners to the best educational providers.", 'As part of the founding team, you’ll be a key early leader shaping our culture, strategy, and product.', 'Requirements', 'Have first-hand experience building full-stack applications and shipping & scaling products.', 'Build product', 'Have a passion for education and lifelong learning.', 'Position Description:', 'Build our team and culture', 'Required Skills: AWS, GCP, Node.js, React.js, Vue.js, Ruby On Rails\xa0', "We are looking for an entrepreneurial engineer to create the future of social enrichment learning. You will be in charge of building the product, and if you're interested, the team & culture necessary to scale it. You'll work directly with us to build tools for some of the world's most storied institutions and the growing communities they serve. This is an opportunity to make a meaningful impact on the future of lifelong learning.", 'Respond well to open-ended problems and thrive on autonomy.', 'You will build and own end-to-end (hands-on) development of large parts of our product.', 'Responsibilities:', "Have built up a team of engineers around you and a culture to support everyone's best work.", 'As part of the founding team, you’ll be a key early leader shaping our culture, strategy, and product.You will craft our Engineering culture and set the quality bar high. ['The Technical Support Engineer will provide support for the global Commerce Cloud customer base. Key elements of the role involve handling technical application and infrastructure issues and ensuring our customers are set-up for success. You will take ownership of high priority customer issues while working with the extended Support and Engineering teams. Team members will be required to thoroughly troubleshoot and document customer cases to ensure effective problem and preventative case management. The objective of this group is to create memorable customer experiences for our customers resulting in them being wildly successful using our products.', 'Familiarity of Magento Commerce, or any other eCommerce Platforms (Support, Site Development or QA role).', 'First point of contact for customer concerns relating to technical issues with the Magento E-commerce application.Customer advocate and represent their needs with internal product and engineering teams.Provide timely response/resolution to technical, product and cloud infrastructure inquires.Provides resolutions within established Service Level Agreement Guidelines.Trouble-shoot/qualify cases before advancing it to engineering.Answer questions regarding product functionality and usage.Work high priority technical incidents and critical outages.Product content creation (KB articles, whitepapers, forum participation)..', 'Product content creation (KB articles, whitepapers, forum participation)..', 'Strong knowledge of the Linux command line.', 'Job Title: LAMP Application Support EngineerLocation: Austin, TXDuration: 1 year', 'Answer questions regarding product functionality and usage.', 'Customer advocate and represent their needs with internal product and engineering teams.', 'Work high priority technical incidents and critical outages.', 'Proficient in technical problem-solving methodologies.', 'Strong organizational and time management skills including multi-tasking and prioritizing job duties.', 'Summary: ', 'Provide timely response/resolution to technical, product and cloud infrastructure inquires.', 'Trouble-shoot/qualify cases before advancing it to engineering.', 'Understanding of modern web technologies and relationships between them Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP, NGINX, Redis, DNS, CDN and SSL.', 'Qualifications:', 'Provides resolutions within established Service Level Agreement Guidelines.', 'Experience troubleshooting web application and performance issues. ', 'Familiarity with programming/scripting languages such as PHP, Node.js, Perl, Java and Python.', 'Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP, NGINX, Redis, DNS, CDN and SSL.', 'Relational database skills: Familiarity with MySQL and database queries.', 'Responsibilities:', '5+ years of experience in an enterprise software or cloud support environment.', 'Excellent (oral and written) communication skills in English. ', 'Ability to adapt and change in a dynamic environment.', '5+ years of experience in an enterprise software or cloud support environment.Understanding of modern web technologies and relationships between them Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP, NGINX, Redis, DNS, CDN and SSL.Experience troubleshooting web application and performance issues. Ability to analyze/extrapolate issues via logs and other sources of information to provide infrastructure and application teams a good starting point for in depth reviews.Strong knowledge of the Linux command line.Relational database skills: Familiarity with MySQL and database queries.Familiarity with programming/scripting languages such as PHP, Node.js, Perl, Java and Python.Familiarity of Magento Commerce, or any other eCommerce Platforms (Support, Site Development or QA role).Strong organizational and time management skills including multi-tasking and prioritizing job duties.Proficient in technical problem-solving methodologies.Ability to adapt and change in a dynamic environment.Excellent (oral and written) communication skills in English. Available for on-call rotation, work off hours, holiday and weekend hours as required.', 'Ability to analyze/extrapolate issues via logs and other sources of information to provide infrastructure and application teams a good starting point for in depth reviews.', 'Available for on-call rotation, work off hours, holiday and weekend hours as required.', "We're changing the world. How? We give people the tools to bring their ideas to life and create content that makes life more fun and work more meaningful. We give businesses and organizations the power to truly engage their customers. We're the ones behind the elegantly designed content that streams across your laptop, TV, phone, and tablet every day-and we're the ones who harness the massive power of big data to help companies move from data to insight and insight to action by delivering content that people crave most. ", 'First point of contact for customer concerns relating to technical issues with the Magento E-commerce application.']

['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Evaluate new project requests and review measuring metrics of each development', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Protect operations by keeping information confidential', 'Qualifications', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s degree or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or related major', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with image processing is desirable.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Assist teammates to prioritize features, decide technologies to be used and design system architectures', '\xa0We are looking for a generalist Software Engineer / Sr. Software Engineer to help develop and maintain the company’s software systems. You will have the opportunity to make positive impacts by helping the company develop solutions specific to its business needs. This role will be user-facing and will provide opportunities to lead local and international system development projects.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Manage milestones, schedules and resources of software system projects', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with automated testing frameworks', 'Responsibilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Java and SQL Server is desirable', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Communicate effectively with users to understand pain points and translate requirements to system specifications', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with embedded systems, FPGA verification is a plus.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with agile development methodologies is desirable', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0For Senior level position, must have 3-4 years of experience of software development in C++, and web development using Python, Django, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript under a Linux environment', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Dev Ops tools such as JIRA, GitLab and Jenkins', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ensure automated testing procedures are properly set up during system development', 'To be a successful candidate, you must be hands-on, comfortable with ambiguity, attentive to documentation/code quality, and passionate about continuously improving software development processes. Ideally, you should be a generalist, one who understands that the software projects you take on will vary widely: from embedded systems, enterprise software, dev tools, human resources management systems, front end and backend support, to FPGA verification, image processing, and machine learning. You should have a good understanding of SDLC, Dev Ops tools, Object-Oriented Programming and database design/integration under Linux environment. Experience with C++, Python, are necessary.\xa0Experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and MySQL are important. Practical experience with image processing, FPGA verification, FW development, data analysis, machine learning, and Business Intelligence (BI) are pluses.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong verbal, written and communications skills', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ensure comprehensive and accurate documentation throughout SDLC', 'EOE/Minorities/Females/Vet/Disability', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop and maintain company’s software systems independently with minimum guidance', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with large-scale data analysis and machine learning is desirable']

job_title: Software Engineer with Front End Focus
job_text: ['', 'Demonstrated ability to work independently and without supervision. You will be expected to make business and technology decisions on a daily basis', 'Join the team that proudly supports the highest ranked Customer Success\u202fplatform\u202fon G2 Crowd, Capterra and Trust Radius\u202f– and be an important part to our continued success!', 'Build innovative and performant features into our Customer Success platform using the latest engineering practices and technologies.Write clear and maintainable full-stack code while working in a professional software engineering environment (source control, continuous integration, short release cycles, automated testing, etc…).Work with Support and Customer Success Managers to quickly identify and resolve customer reported issues. Provide root cause analysis and participate in continuous improvement initiatives and occasionally engage with customers to resolve technical difficulties.Make pragmatic and data-driven decisions that will meet both business and technology needs.Communicate with the Quality Assurance team on a regular basis. Strive to deliver work in small chunks that can be tested early in the development process.Draft technical documentation for product functionalityWork with the Product and QA teams to flush out feature designs. Break work up into well defined manageable units of work.Participate in regularly scheduled security reviews. Review periodic security scan results and address any found security vulnerabilities.Document key business workflows and software design.', '2+ years of working with a relevant front-end framework (AngularJS, Angular, React, etc…)', '2+ years of relational database design and development (MS SQL Server, MySql, Oracle, etc…)', 'SaaS/Cloud experience strongly preferred', 'Qualifications', 'Bachelor’s in Computer Science or related field or 3-5 years of applicable experience', 'Document key business workflows and software design.', 'Make pragmatic and data-driven decisions that will meet both business and technology needs.', 'ChurnZero helps subscription businesses fight customer churn. Our software solutions allow businesses to understand how their customers use their product, asses their health and their likelihood to renew, and give businesses the means to personalize the customer experience through timely and relevant touchpoints. ChurnZero is backed by the leading angels and venture capital firms Baird Capital, Grotech Ventures, and Middleland Capital.', 'Communicate with the Quality Assurance team on a regular basis. Strive to deliver work in small chunks that can be tested early in the development process.', 'Participate in regularly scheduled security reviews. Review periodic security scan results and address any found security vulnerabilities.', 'Responsibilities', "Our fast-growing startup is looking for a skilled, self-motivated problem solver to join our team as a\u202fFull Stack Software Engineer with a focus on front end technologies. As a\u202fSoftware Engineer, you will work closely with our product and quality assurance teams to design, implement, deliver and support our top-rated Customer Success platform. All developers at ChurnZero are given the opportunity to own their features from the UI all the way down to the database and with that comes the requirement of writing professional and maintainable code in a variety of languages. The ideal candidate is one that has expertise in AngularJS, C# and Microsoft's SQL ecosystem.", 'At this time we are unable to consider candidates who would require a VISA now or in the future. This position is not remote and candidates will need to relocate or be living in the Raleigh, NC OR Washington DC area to be considered.\xa0', '2+ years developing and interacting with REST services', '2+ years of working with a relevant front-end framework (AngularJS, Angular, React, etc…)2+ years working with Microsoft development stack (ASP.NET, MVC, Web Api, .NET Core, etc…)2+ years developing and interacting with REST services2+ years of relational database design and development (MS SQL Server, MySql, Oracle, etc…)SaaS/Cloud experience strongly preferredStrong verbal and written communications skillsDemonstrated ability to work independently and without supervision. You will be expected to make business and technology decisions on a daily basisAbility to balance technical perfection with business timelinesBachelor’s in Computer Science or related field or 3-5 years of applicable experience', 'Strong verbal and written communications skills', 'Draft technical documentation for product functionality', 'Work with Support and Customer Success Managers to quickly identify and resolve customer reported issues. Provide root cause analysis and participate in continuous improvement initiatives and occasionally engage with customers to resolve technical difficulties.', 'Write clear and maintainable full-stack code while working in a professional software engineering environment (source control, continuous integration, short release cycles, automated testing, etc…).', 'Build innovative and performant features into our Customer Success platform using the latest engineering practices and technologies.', 'Please note:\xa0At this time we are unable to consider candidates who would require a VISA now or in the future. This position is not remote and candidates will need to relocate or be living in the Raleigh, NC OR Washington DC area to be considered.\xa0', 'Ability to balance technical perfection with business timelines', 'Please note:', '2+ years working with Microsoft development stack (ASP.NET, MVC, Web Api, .NET Core, etc…)', 'About ChurnZero', 'Work with the Product and QA teams to flush out feature designs. Break work up into well defined manageable units of work.']
